name: Breathless Cancun Soul Resort And Spa
address: Blvd. Kukulcan Km. 4.5, Num Ext.: Mz 34, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Nestled between the Caribbean Sea and Nichupte Lagoon, Breathless Cancun Soul Resort & Spa offers vibrant, contemporary décor and is located along the Cancun strip in the Hotel Zone. This beachfront resort will feature 429 suites, including the xhale club and the Unlimited-Luxury® vacation concept with a variety of luxurious amenities and services. Breathless Cancun Soul Resort & Spa also features the standard CleanComplete Verification™ protocols on property. This 360-degree quality, safety and hygiene program takes into account every aspect of the on-property experience, backed by the highly-respected third-party certificationWebBeds

name: Hilton Cancun Mar Caribe
address: Kukulcan Km 17, Zona Hotelera, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Located in Cancun, the resort is a short walk from Iberostar Cancun Peninsula Convention Centre and offers a private beach, free Wi-Fi and an outdoor pool. It is a short drive from Hard Rock Cafe Cancun and provides free public parking on site. Guests can soak up the outdoors on the terrace or enjoy a drink at the bar. It provides family-friendly facilities, with room layouts and services for families of any size, as well as a kids pool and a kids club. Those staying at the property can also hire a bicycle to explore Cancun and its surrounds. After a day of discovering the nearby region, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. Each have a flat-screen TV, tea and coffee making facilities and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. Hilton Cancun Mar Caribe boasts convenient dining options, including Mediterranean and Italian dishes at La Luce and Mexican meals at Maxal. Eateries at the resort include Azulinda and Noriku. A selection of dining options are also available in the area. The resort is less than a 20-minute drive from Cancun International Airport and Iberostar Cancun Golf Course is a brief stroll away. The staff at the tour desk are available to book and organize activities in Cancun.HotelsCombined

name: Secrets The Vine Cancun Adults Only
address: Blvd Kukulcan Km 14.5, Zona Hotelera, Zona Hotelera Cancun Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Atelier Playa Mujeres
address: Lote 13, Rth-4, SM003, Mz.001, 77400 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: General description: The hotel Atelier Playa Mujeres (adults only) is located right on a sandy beach. At the beach, there are sun loungers and sun umbrellas free of charge. The town Cancun is around 14 km away (Playa del Carmen around 80 km, Tulum around 143 km). For mobility there is a car rental company. The airport (CUN) is approx. 28 km away. Amenities: The 5-storey beach hotel consists of a main building and an adjoining building, and has 429 rooms in total. It offers its guests a reception (check-in from 15:00, check-out until 12:00), a lobby with bar, 6 lifts, air conditioning, a safe (for free), a shop, theater, a free parking area and a money changing facility. For the meals, there are 8 restaurants (air-conditioned). In a total 7 bars, you can relax in good company. WiFi is available for free. Room service is free of charge. Room cleaning, laundry / ironing service, concierge service and medical service are available for a fee. Pool: In the outdoor area of the hotel you will find one fresh water pool. Here, there are sun umbrellas and sun loungers for free available. Refreshing beverages can be consumed directly at the pool bar. Sport and Leisure: Sports and entertainment: Table tennis (where applicable, for a fee) and fitness. Spa area, sauna, solarium and massages available for a fee. Entertainment for adults: activity programme. Additional information: Additional fees may apply for certain facilities, amenities or activities. Some services depend on the local climatic conditions and the season. Languages spoken: English and Spanish. Accepted methods of payment: Euro / MasterCard, Visa and American Express. Some services and facilities might be closed or offered with restrictions due to COVID19 Prevention measurement. Changes can be applied without previous notice.Ticket Package

name: Canopy by Hilton Cancun La Isla
address: Boulevard Kukulcan South North Km 12 5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Hello and welcome to Canopy by Hilton Cancun La Isla, a new, urban hotel beside the lagoon in Cancun hotel zone. Enjoy being steps from some of the best shopping brands, restaurants and white sand beaches. We will introduce you to the neighborhood with a local welcome gift at check-in. At Canopy, we have got you covered. Our Just-Right Rooms are comfortable, modern spaces with the amenities you want, like free WiFi, a 55-inch HDTV, murals from local artists and our exclusively designed Canopy beds. Deluxe rooms feature views of the ocean and double shower, while our suites include a living room, dining area, espresso/bar cart and hanging chair as well as signature Canopy bathrobe. Feel better going forward and fill up your bottles with filtered water on every floor. Welcome the day in the cafe with a delicious artisanal breakfast made with fresh ingredients and local produce or have a Canopy Break Fast bag delivered to your door. Dine at Azulinda Cafe and Bar or head to the roof to sip cocktails, fresh juices or coffee al fresco. Enjoy the view while working out or relaxing poolside at our rooftop fitness center and outdoor pool. If there is business to be done, settle into our co-working space with comfortable seating and plenty of charging outlets. We also offer three boardrooms for meetings and events, and our beautiful terrace will accommodate up to 36 guests. Enjoy all Hilton Honors benefits at our Energizing hotel.Hilton

name: Dreams Vista Cancun Golf & Spa Resort
address: Lote I-03 Manzana 12 Supermanzana 84, 77520 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Dreams Vista Cancun is an all-new, all ocean view, family resort! Set beachfront along the Caribbean Sea, there’s activities for the kid in everyone—a beautiful beach, four pools and watersports galore. The resort’s prime location is close to the wonders and ruins of the Mayan Riviera, and right next door to the Puerto Cancun Golf Club The brand new, modern rooms and suites at Dreams Vista Cancun all offer ocean views from a private, furnished balcony or terrace, an in-room mini-bar and more. Connecting rooms, family suites, and Sun Club upgrades are also available. All rooms and suites are non-smoking.WebBeds

name: Nizuc Resort and Spa
address: Kukulcan Boulevard Km 21 Punta Nizuc, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Offering panoramic views of the Caribbean Sea, Nizuc Resort & Spa is located on the secluded Punta Nizuc and features an outdoor pool, private dock and spa. Free Wi-Fi and free private parking are available to guests. The air-conditioned rooms offer Nespresso coffee makers and flat-screen TVs. The spacious bathrooms feature a bath tubs with rainfall showers. The 6 on-site restaurants serve modern Mexican dishes, Peruvian ceviches as well as Asian and Mediterranean food. Tours and activities can be arranged by the concierge. Nizuc Resort & Spa has event and meeting facilities. Guests can enjoy a variety of massages or treatments in the luxurious on-site spa. The Nizuc Thermal Experience is a feast to awaken the senses through a guided circuit of hydrotherapy. Laguna Nichupté can be reached 6.9 km. Cancun International Airport is a 10 minutes’ drive from Nizuc Resort & Spa. The center of Cancun can be reached within 25 minutes by car.

name: Live Aqua Beach Resort Cancun
address: Blvd. Kukulcan Km.12.5, Zona Hotelera, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Offering direct access to Cancún Beach, Live Aqua Cancun Beach Resort Cancun. Only features an outdoor swimming pool overlooking the Caribbean Sea. It has attractive rooms with balconies, 9 restaurants, 5 bars and a spa. Each spacious, air-conditioned room at the Live Aqua Beach Resort Cancun has stylish décor with tiled floors. All rooms include a TV, coffee maker, aromatherapy products, a safety-deposit box and a minibar which is refilled daily. The stylish Siete Restaurant serves a range of Mexican cuisine, while European and Asian dishes are on offer in the mb Restaurant. The Azur serves international options set by the pool and overlooking the sea. The Aqua’s extensive spa offers hydrotherapy treatments, massage and aromatherapy. There are also hot tubs and steam baths. There is a gym available, while yoga classes are also available. Located in Cancún’s Hotel Zone, the Live Aqua is set next to Nichupte Lagoon and in front of the popular La Isla shopping centre. Please note this is an adults-only hotel.

name: Casa Caribe Cancun
address: Calle 112 Este, SM 84, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Featuring a year-round outdoor pool, Casa Caribe Cancun in Cancún provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking for guests who drive. Each unit features a balcony, a kitchen with a microwave, a dining area and a flat-screen TV, while the private bathroom includes a bath or shower and free toiletries. Some units include a seating area and/or a terrace. A continental breakfast is available daily at the aparthotel. The restaurant at Casa Caribe Cancun serves local cuisine. Guests can relax in the garden at the property. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Puerto Juarez Beach, Playa Blanca and Gran Puerto Cancún. The nearest airport is Cancún International, 21 km from Casa Caribe Cancun, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Cancun Hotel Zone
address: Blvrd. Kukulcan Lt. 1-02 Zona Hotelera Km. 23.5 MZ60, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Set a pace that suits you at Residence Inn Cancun Hotel. Whether you're with us for a few days, a few weeks, or a few months, your daily routine matters. With a location in Cancun's hotel zone area within the Nizuc channel reserve, surrounded by nature, just 9 km away from the Airport. Enjoy complimentary breakfast, Wi-Fi and connect to work and the outside world. Work up a sweat in our hotel's fitness center, ready for strengthening body and mind. Relax and unwind when you want. Thrive at our extended-stay hotel with the conveniences you need, like pet-friendly studios, one- and two-bedroom suites with separate living and sleeping areas. Take advantage of Cancun's bounteous produce in your hotel room's fully equipped kitchen, ready for your favorite cuisine. At Residence Inn, we welcome you to Mexico with open arms. Pets are allowed at our hotel too, so everyone in your family is welcome.Marriott

name: Four Points by Sheraton Cancun Centro
address: Avenida Tulum, MZ 1, Lote 2, SM 12, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: In an atmosphere of classic timeless style right in Cancún’s growing financial and shopping district, step into the serene and safe environment of Four Points by Sheraton Cancún Centro where our guests can enjoy comfortable amenities, relaxing accommodations, and productive workspaces. Our family-friendly hotel in Cancún is conveniently located close to hospitals, specialty clinics, universities, and shopping centers. Seeking an authentic local experience downtown, it is perfect for exploring the local area with passion, just 20 minutes away from the hotel zone and the Caribbean Sea beaches. Our easy interior connection to the awarded in the field of health at Galenia Hospital, find a sanctuary in our large rooms and plush bedding. We pride ourselves on superior service, an inviting atmosphere, and a host of thoughtful amenities created to satisfy the corporate and leisure traveler. Maintain your balance at our 24/7 fitness center, and unwind in our beautiful outdoor pool and pool terrace.Marriott

name: Hotel Green 16
address: Ave. Pok Ta Pok Lote 4, 5 Y 6, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Hotel Green 16 is conveniently located in the popular Hotel Zone area. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Hotel Green 16. Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer fan, air conditioning, wake-up service, desk, mini bar to ensure a restful night. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Hotel Green 16 is an excellent choice from which to explore Cancun or to simply relax and rejuvenate.Agoda

name: Hyatt Ziva Cancun
address: Blvd. Kukulcan, Manzana 51, Lote 7, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This stunning beachfront resort is set on the beautiful strip of Punta Cancun and framed by the Caribbean Sea, where you can enjoy a white sand beach and clear-blue waters. All rooms at Hyatt Ziva Cancún include a flat-screen TV, mini bar and a coffee machine. Rooms feature a private bathroom equipped with a shower as well as bath robes and slippers. Hyatt Ziva Cancun offers a variety of activities, from theater shows to water sports to tequila tastings and a microbrewery. Choose to lounge in a beach cabana, sip a margarita and enjoy diving, snorkeling, sailing, and swimming in the Caribbean. Soak up the sun at cascading pools overlooking the sea, including the pool bar. Enjoy the oceanfront spa, with a massage, holistic body treatments, hydrotherapy and a fitness center. Hyatt Ziva Cancun is located 300 metres from Coco Bongo while La Isla Shopping Mall is 3.4 km away. Cancun International Airport is 17 km away.

name: Punta Blanca Beach House
address: Fraccionamiento Santa Fatima Manzana 3, Lote 1, Municipio Isla Mujeres, Zona Continental, 77400 Isla Mujeres, Quintana Roo
description: Situated in Costa Mujeres, 19 km from Cancun Bus Station, Punta Blanca Beach House features accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a bar and a private beach area. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a microwave, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Punta Blanca Beach House provides some rooms with sea views, and the rooms include a balcony. At the accommodation rooms have bed linen and towels. Continental and American breakfast options are available each morning at Punta Blanca Beach House. Cancun Government Palace is 20 km from the hotel, while Beto Avila Stadium is 21 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cancún International, 36 km from Punta Blanca Beach House, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Secrets Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort Adults Only
address: Lote Rth-7-PM-II, Lte1, Mz 1, Smz 3, 77400 Isla Mujeres, Quintana Roo
description: Located in beautiful Playa Mujeres, complete with famous white sandy beaches and stunning ocean views in a privileged gated community. This brand new, AAA Four Diamond award winning, adults-only, all-suite resort is only 35 minutes from the Cancun International Airport and 10 minutes from downtown Cancun, in an 18-hole signature Greg Norman golf course. Featuring 424 suites, 9 restaurants and 7 bars; open air spaces make it ideal to enjoy the warm ocean breeze and get a tropical feeling. It features two protected flora and fauna areas where some of the region's flowers and birds can be seen and photographed. Each of the luxurious, comfortable suites are finely appointed with wood elements and spacious terraces.  All Secrets Playa Mujeres guests have the opportunity to enjoy Exchange Privileges (Free flow access) to Dreams Playa Mujeres, located next door, adding 10 restaurants and 13 bars options. Ticket Package

name: SLS Cancun
address: Boulevard Kukulcan km 1 Zona Turistica Puerto Cancun Lote 1 02 Uc 1 Mz 27, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Featuring 45 suites, world class décor, unforgettable dining and nightlife experiences. World Class author Restaurant Leynia. Vibrant Beach Club with the most breathtaking frontbeach in Cancun. Exclusive access to the sbe Collection and global concierge. This unprecedented destination awaits to amaze you.accorhotels.com

name: Secrets Playa Blanca Costa Mujeres
address: Carr Punta Sam - Isla Blanca,Mz 2, Lt 10, 77400 Isla Mujeres, Quintana Roo
description: Secrets Playa Blanca Costa Mujeres offers the perfect backdrop for romantic relaxation and exploration, situated along a secluded strip of idyllic oceanfront coast, only 12 miles north of Cancun and a short drive to championship golf and a variety of historical local attractions. This all-adult, luxury property resides on an expansive and pristine white-sand beach with crystal-clear waters and features 507 modern suites each embellished with handmade art and furnishings crafted from organic, locally sourced materials, providing a truly authentic experience. The elevated Preferred Club accommodations provide an extra level of luxury with upgraded amenities and exclusive access to the Preferred Club Lounge, an oceanfront Beach Bar and a unique pool surrounded by lush vegetation. Indulge with Unlimited-Luxury®, where everything is included. Astonish your palate with limitless gourmet dining, sip top-shelf spirits served at our elegant bars and lounges and enjoy a wide variety of entertainment offered both day and night. From calming beachfront infinity pools overlooking the ocean to an engaging activities pool offering excitement throughout the day, there is something for everyone. Wind down with a specialty treatment at the Secrets Spa by Pevonia®, delight in evening shows at the theater or try one of our culinary experiences from wine and tequila tastings to cooking classes.Sembo

name: Avani Cancún Airport Hotel
address: Carr Fed Cancun-Puerto Morelos SM47 M01, 77506 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: The 4* Avani Cancún Airport is located just seven minutes from Cancún International Airport, close to local tourist attractions. Surrounded by lush jungle greenery and a short distance from Cancún’s beautiful sandy beaches, the hotel offers business and leisure guests 140 comfortable rooms and suites to choose from. All the rooms feature a contemporary design, Lavazza coffee machines, large flat-screen TVs and complimentary Wi-Fi. An international buffet breakfast is served in the hotel restaurant daily, with an early-bird option for early risers. Gluten-free and children’s options menu are available on request. The hotel’s dining options include local, national and international cuisine, with snacks, meals and drinks available in the hotel restaurant, the lobby bar or the poolside terrace bar. Meetings and special events can be held in the hotel’s well-equipped events spaces, with capacity of up to 265 guests. Those staying at the hotel enjoy complimentary access to the gym and the outdoor pool, where they can relax in lush, green surroundings.NH Hoteles

name: The Fives Oceanfront
address: Av. Javier Rojo Gomez SM 002 Mza 25 LT 1, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Set in Puerto Morelos, a few steps from Playa Puerto Morelos, The Fives Oceanfront offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. The property features a bar, as well as a restaurant serving Italian cuisine. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. The Fives Oceanfront features certain units with city views, and all rooms are fitted with a balcony. At the accommodation every room has bed linen and towels. Guests at The Fives Oceanfront can enjoy a continental breakfast. You can play table tennis at this 5-star hotel, and the area is popular for cycling. Cancun Underwater Museum is 30 km from the hotel, while ADO International Bus Station is 36 km away. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 25 km from The Fives Oceanfront.

name: Selina Cancun Laguna Hotel Zone
address: Blvd. Kukulcan 9, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Set in Cancún, 400 metres from Playa Forum, Selina Cancun Laguna Hotel Zone offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Offering a restaurant, the property also has a terrace and a bar. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared kitchen and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel offers a continental or vegetarian breakfast. Popular points of interest near Selina Cancun Laguna Hotel Zone include Playa Gaviota Azul, Playa Chac Mool and Playa Punta Cancun. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 21 km from the accommodation.

name: Intercontinental Presidente Cancun Resort
address: Boulevard Kukulkan KM 7.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Enjoy breathtaking views of the Caribbean Sea from one of our 300 equipped rooms and suites in the best 5 star hotel in Cancun. Located in the hotel zone and the best beach in Cancun, a wide beach with a calm sea and no waves. 15 minutes from the city and nightlife and 30 minutes from the airport. Relax in our spa in a peaceful environment while your children have fun in our kids club with professional staff.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Ibis Cancun Centro
address: Av Tulum y Nichupte Supermanzana 11 M2 L3, 77504 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: ibis Cancun Centro, in the city's largest business district, is just steps from Las Americas shopping center, 15 minutes from the airport, and 10 minutes from Cancun's crystal-clear waters. Offering 190 modern, comfortable rooms, ibis Kitchen Lounge restaurant, daily breakfast buffet, bar with 24/7 snack service. Free WiFi, parking and facilities for those with special needs. 100% smoke-freeaccorhotels.com

name: Casa Blanca Boutique & Organic
address: 6 Alce 7 20, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Situated 1.4 km from the centre of Cancún, 1.1 km from Beto Avila Stadium, Casa Blanca Boutique & Organic features air-conditioned accommodation with a patio, an outdoor swimming pool and free bikes. Featuring free WiFi, the units have a safety deposit box, a washing machine and a flat-screen TV with streaming services. Some units have a terrace and/or a balcony with pool or garden views. A continental breakfast is available each morning at the bed and breakfast. A car rental service is available at Casa Blanca Boutique & Organic, while cycling can be enjoyed nearby. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Cancun Government Palace, Cancun Bus Station and Cristo Rey Church. The nearest airport is Cancún International, 17 km from Casa Blanca Boutique & Organic, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Dreams Natura Riviera Cancun
address: Sm 31, Mz 03, Lote 101-21, Km 332, 77500 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Located 15 minutes away from Cancun International Airport This family-friendly beachfront resort offers guests an Unlimited-Luxury® vacation, where everything is included: 24-hour access to unlimited food and beverage options, à la carte dining with no reservations, endless activities for all ages and more. Rooms and suites feature comforts including a private balcony or terrace and a fully stocked mini-bar. Opening November 2019- Inspired by the surrounding Mayan jungle, the all-new Now Natura Riviera Cancun will offer a unique Unlimited-Luxury® experience. Facing the Caribbean Sea on a white sand beach, the 556-room resort is a short 10-mile drive from the Cancun International AirportWebBeds

name: Dreams Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort
address: Lote Rth-7-pm-ii, Lte1, Mz 1, Smz 3, 77400 Isla Mujeres, Quintana Roo
description: Perfectly situated in the exclusive gated community of Playa Mujeres, within a world-famous golf course, rests the stunning AAA Four Diamond Dreams Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort. This all-suite resort boasts 502 graciously appointed and luxuriously equipped suites, surrounded by secluded white sand beaches and the turquoise Caribbean Sea. Three levels of swimming pools spanning over 65,000 square feet, including two infinity pools with breathtaking ocean views, six hot tubs, a children’s pool, a water park for little ones, a water park for all ages. Located just 10 minutes from downtown Cancun and 35 minutes from Cancun International Airport, this luxurious resort provides an ideal vacation setting for couples and couples with children. At Dreams Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort, guests will enjoy the benefits of Unlimited Luxury®, where everything is included and no wristband — unlimited premium drinks at any of our 13 bars and lounges, gourmet à la carte dining, room service, daily refreshed mini-bar, pool and beach wait Service. All adult guests (+18 years old) from Dreams Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort will have free flow access to Secrets Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort, located next door. With 9 additional restaurant options, 7 additional bars, 2 additional pools and more! If Preferred Club room category is reserved, status and inclusions are provided in both properties!

name: Breathless Riviera Cancun Resort & Spa (Adults Only)
address: Calle 12 Mza. 41 Lote 2-04, Bahia Petempich, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Breathless Riviera Cancun Resort & Spa, nestled between the Caribbean Sea and the Lagoon of Bahia Petempich, is a vibrant, chic, and modern all-suite resort for adults seeking a sophisticated and lively getaway. The resort’s layout consisting of two horseshoe-shaped buildings and sections, each with its own unique personality and vibe, offers singles, couples, and friends the perfect balance of excitement and relaxation. Mix and mingle at a water aerobics class or relax with a curated cocktail in hand by the energy pool or become immersed in entertainment and dance to the music of international DJs in the Xcelerate zone. Enjoy the Unlimited-Luxury® inclusions of boundless gourmet dining and premium brand beverages at 9 trendy options; including five à la carte restaurants, a tapas option, one buffet, a grill on the beach, a snack area by the Xcelerate pool and The Nook café. Guests can enjoy bites at Spoon and nine bars and lounges, along with 24-hour room and concierge services, a captivating Events Calendar, and more. There is a 24-hour front desk, a cash machine and hairdresser's at the property. Free use of bicycles is available at this resort and the area is popular for snorkeling and diving. Playa del Carmen is 38 km from Breathless Riviera Cancun Resort & Spa, while Cozumel is 45 km away. Cancún International Airport is 16 km from the property.

name: Oleo Cancun Playa
address: Blvd. Kukulkan Km 19.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Fairfield Inn & Suites by Marriott Cancun Airport
address: Blvd Luis Donaldo Colosio SM 305 Mza 01, 77533 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Rest easy at the new Fairfield Inn & Suites Cancun Airport, a contemporary hotel in Quintana Roo, Mexico. Unpack and recharge in stylishly appointed accommodations with thoughtful essentials, including complimentary Wi-Fi and ergonomic work desks. Fuel up for a day or exploration with a free breakfast of omelets, bacon, mini waffles and fresh fruit. Soak up the warm Cancun sunshine as you explore celebrated local attractions, including Experiencias Xcaret, Ventura Park, Paya Delfines, Plaza Caracol and Lagos Del Sol. Celebrate your big moments in versatile event venues and host flawless meetings and conferences in sophisticated meeting space with custom catering and AV equipment. When it's all said and done, refresh your body in the sparkling waters of our pool and get in a workout in our fitness center. At Fairfield Inn & Suites Cancun Airport, you’re our #1 priority. Ask us about The Fairfield 100% Guarantee™, where we promise you'll be satisfied or we'll make it right. That's our commitment to you.Marriott

name: Pachamaya Suites, Wellness & Retreats
address: Avenida Uxmal, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Cancun Hostel
address: 11b Nichupté, 77533 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Cancun Hostel offers accommodation within 1.7 km of the centre of Cancún, with free WiFi, and a kitchenette with a microwave, a fridge and kitchenware. Some units feature a terrace and/or a balcony. The bed and breakfast offers a continental or American breakfast. The restaurant at Cancun Hostel specialises in American, seafood and local cuisine. The accommodation offers a picnic area. Guests can also relax in the garden, beside the outdoor swimming pool, or in the shared lounge area. Beto Avila Stadium is 3.4 km from Cancun Hostel, while Cancun Government Palace is 4.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 17 km from the bed and breakfast.

name: Dreams Sapphire Resort & Spa
address: Super Manzana 11, Manzana 9, Lote 10, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: This outstanding award-winning resort has a privileged location, situated on a wonderful landscape and offering a spectacular view of the Caribbean Sea. The property is set in Puerto Morelos, a famous fishing village located at only 35km from Cancun, where visitors can find multiple leisure options such as exciting excursions and water activities as well as a wide range of restaurants and cafes. This hotel offers a world of luxury to its guests with spacious and elegant rooms equipped with a private balcony or a terrace and a complimentary mini-bar refreshed daily with soft drinks and bottled water. Travellers will find unlimited activities for their entertainment as well as a spa offering the most advanced treatments. Guests can choose between six different restaurants offering a huge variety of international cuisine and various bars and lounges where they can taste a delicious cocktail.FarePortal

name: Selina Cancun Downtown
address: Av. Tulum nº 75, Sm. 22, Mz. 26, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This Cancun hotel is less than 200 yards from ADO bus station. Tour information and guest rooms provide free Wi-Fi. The local bus station offers transportation to Cancun International Airport every 30 minutes. Selina Cancun is within walking distance from local restaurants.

name: Hacienda de Castilla
address: Calle 17, Sm. 64, Mza. 23, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This hotel is just 5 minutes’ drive from Playa Blanca Beach. It features an outdoor swimming pool and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. There is a 24-hour reception desk and free private parking. All rooms at Hacienda de Castilla include cable TV and a private bathroom with toiletries. The La Hija de Villa bar-restaurant serves Mexican cuisine. Here, guests can also enjoy sporting events and live entertainment. The Mandala Beach Club is a 20-minute drive away and offers loungers, tables and parasols. Hotel guests receive discounts on food and drinks. Puerto Juarez Harbour is about 10 minutes’ drive away and offers ferries to Isla Mujeres. Cancún International Airport is 30 minutes’ drive away. A shuttle service is available at an additional cost.

name: Casa Boutique Hokhmah
address: Rta Cenotes Central Vallarta, KM 15.5, 77506 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Nirvana Hotel & Hostel - Cancun Hotel Zone
address: Av. Pok Ta Pok, Lote 4, Hotel Zone, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This property offers a restaurant where you can get breakfast, lunch and dinner. - Cancun Hotel Zone is situated in Cancún in the Quintana Roo Region, 5 km from La Isla Shopping Mall. Nirvana Hotel - Cancun Hotel Zone 5 minutes driving to the Mandala beach club. Some rooms have views of the lake or garden. Every room is fitted with a private bathroom and hygine products. Nirvana Hotel - Cancun Hotel Zone features free WiFi throughout the property. A convenience store, and laundry services can be find on site. The hostel also offers a tour and activities desk. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Coco Bongo is 2 km from Nirvana Hotel - Cancun Hotel Zone, while Cancun Downtown is 7 km from the property. Cancun International Airport is 15 km away.

name: Ocean View Cancun Arenas
address: Blvd Kukulkan Km 2.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Steps from the beach, in Cancun's Hotel Zone, surrounded by gardens, nightclubs and restaurants, this hotel offers many meal options with 3 on-site restaurants and has free wireless internet access. Ocean View Cancun Arenas features an outdoor pool with daily activities and nightly entertainment. Guests can relax with a drink from the poolside snack bar or workout in the fitness center. After a day spent at the beach, visitors can relax on their private balcony or terrace. Guests at the Cancun Arenas Holiday Inn will appreciate a variety of restaurant options ranging from casual to fine dining. Arenas buffet-style restaurant is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Visitors can choose from beachfront dinning in Ocean Grill Tequila or fine Italian cuisine in Diletto.

The complex is situated at just a 10-minute drive away from Puerto Morelos and lies between the city of Cancun and Playa del Carmen. The guest rooms are fitted with a beautiful Mediterranean decoration and top-notch amenities such as a private balcony, free Internet access and an iPod docking station. When it comes for dining, travellers can choose between different culinary options including local and international dishes. There is also a great selection of bars and lounges where visitors may taste some delicious drinks. The hotel offers a wide range of entertainment venues for all ages, including a kids' club, activities for teens, game courts and a spa where guests may indulge themselves with the latest treatments.FarePortal

We are nearby recognized cenotes and protected natural reserves and water parks. Our modern hotel has sustainable practices and is noted as the best RoofTop in Tulum with two infinity pools, a stunning view of the jungle, and a relaxation area that turns around into an outdoor event area. Boost yourself with energy in its gym with certified instructors and different activities such as yoga in its outdoor venue, and closing, pamper yourself with a massage at the Spa. Try an exquisite, specialized wellness menu for guests who love to exercise and enjoy the fascinating world of mixology in one of our two bars. Motto Tulum is enclosed by the best commercial development with more than 20 stores and a gastronomic offer of 10 restaurants with unique menus.Hilton

name: Una Vida
address: Av. La Selva Entre Kohunlich y Xcaret, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Located in the jungle side of Tulum, apart from the busy areas and into the quietness of the forest. Designed and built by young professionals inspired by the beauty of the surrounding nature. Just a couple blocks from centre town, great restaurants and bars. Only 5 km from the beautiful beach of Tulum where you will have access to amazing beach clubs and also public beach. Eleven separate and independent Villas, with jungle and garden views. Among tall trees, dream catchers and locally sourced handcrafts, with a zen like pool and common area, Una Vida is a fit for families, friends and couples looking for a quiet, fun and chic atmosphere to spend time together. Fully staffed with concierges and housekeeping. Private Chef and bartender available as well as airport shuttles and more. We are prepared to be your home away from home. • 17 rooms in total • 7 One Bedroom • 6 Two Bedroom • 3 Tropical King Rooms (double room) • 1 Full 3 bedroom house, private pool & patio • 2 Zen pool in the common area

Mosquito nets and fans are provided, and all cabins have a private bathroom. You can relax in a hammock on the balcony. Massages and beauty treatments can be booked at Zamas Hotel’s reception. Staff can also arrange local excursions or airport transfers at an extra cost. The Mayan ruins of Tulum are just 4.5 km from Zamas Hotel, while the Sian Ka’an Biosphere Reserve is 6 km away. Cancun Airport is a 90-minute drive from the hotel.

description: Ahau Tulum is an eco-friendly and pet-friendly property that offers free Wi-Fi connection, yoga lessons and massage services for a fee. Bathrobes and iPod dockings are some of the amenities they offer, along with furnished terraces. The bathroom has a shower. The restaurant at Ahau Tulum serves international cuisine. Tulum’s beach is just a few metres from the property, which also has a shared lounge area, laundry and ironing services. Tulum Archaeological Site can be reached in a 10-minute drive, and Tulum is 8.9 km away.

name: Lula Tulum
address: Km 8.2 Carretera Boca Paila, 77790 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Designed to accommodate, Sanar was created with options for intimate relaxation or social interactions with like minded individuals. In 2017 Sanara Tulum was selected #3 in the 150 Greatest Hotels in the world by Harpers Bazaar. The hotel also won the 2015 National Competition in the category of Architecture and Interiors for Hotels from the Asociacion de Arquitectos e Interioristas, Mexico. A space that harmonizes with the beauty of its surroundings. The sleek and simple architecture is nestled in-between wildly sprouting Coconut Palms and Mayan Cheet trees while the ocean provides ample breeze and the serenading sounds of crashing waves.Lula 19 AC rooms, suites and villas, Wellness Center, and Studio are built on the coveted white sand beaches of Tulum, Mexic. Overlooking the crystal clear turquoise sea, the curative boutique hotel offers both Beachside & Sanara Jungle Poolside rooms. Each Lula beach room offers a private balcony, luxurious bathroom, and wardrobe. Dressed with imported bamboo cotton from Italy, both the super king size and additional day bed make for the ultimate luxury in sleeping, and accommodate up to two or three people.The stunningly appointed Sanara Villa, situated in our beachside garden, has one opulent master suite downstairs with a large living room, and upstairs an additional 2 bedroom suite. The Villa can sleep up to 8 adults. +Our Jungle provides 4 gorgeous jungle rooms nestled around a private pool and waterfall, each with a King bed, air conditioning and private bathroom. In addition we offer a Jungle Villa with 2 Suites, each comprising of 1 spacious bedroom and 1 living room. Our Jungle villa also has a stunning Jungle roof terrace which delivers stunning sunsets over the canopy of trees. Sanara Jungle is very popular with groups and more economic travelers who wish to come and enjoy Sanara's stunning yoga facility, the acclaimed cuisine inside The Real Coconut, and of course the priceless Tulum beach. Our restaurant has become a global hit with people traveling just to eat with us. Created by Daniella Hunter, The Real Coconut's philosophy of eating is a regimen for sustainable living, both personally and for the planet. Built on the foundational belief that plants form the key to our vitality and that gut health and digestion are paramount to optimum well being, The Real Coconut is dedicated to all that is conscious living. Daniella integrates key elements of paleo, gluten & grain-free, and vegan diet practices, ultimately creating a menu that is universal without compromising taste. The Real coconut products are now sold in Whole Foods Markets, Costco and thousands of stores stores across the United States, Canada and EnglandThe menus are gluten free; grain free, dairy free; refined sugar free; soy free; and cashew freeIn a coconut shell.our philosophy is plant based food with options to include sustainably sourced animal proteins.The hotel also features one of the most stunning yoga studios on the planet, where Tulum's finest teachers provide three classes a day. And finally you can encounter "care" and "service" in the Sanara Wellness Center, which has also been consistently listed in top wellness lists in thew world, offering a comprehensive menu to help you take away any stress and support your total rejuvenation.iHotelier/iStay

name: Kanan Tulum - Adults Only
address: Carretera Tulum-Boca Paila, Km 8, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Kanan Tulum is a unique eco-friendly spa hotel in Mexico's Caribbean coast. Located on the beach amid the Mayan jungle, it is placed in the middle of the bustling music and art scene, offering a wide range of events in and around the hotel. This adults-only hotel is an experience in its own right, marrying rustic elements with the finest woods and rich textiles.The labyrinth of treetop corridors, wooden staircases, nature portals and branch-woven walkways and nests, all create a sensation of a hidden jungle temple. Get pampered at Kumaru Spa, featuring a full menu of organic services, find adventure on the Caribbean Sea, with an array of beach activities available on-site or enjoy a delightful yoga class at our wooden yoga shala. Indulge in authentic gastronomy, locally sourced dining and drinks, including cocktails at our swim-up pool bar and drinks on our rooftop lounge. Stay tuned for our music events on weekends at our beach club featuring the finest DJs lineups. When you’re ready to explore and experience the magic of Tulum, you’ll find everything from the ancient Mayan ruins and scenic cenotes to unforgettable nature reserves and adventure parks within minutes of our hotel. Take the vacation you deserve at Tulum’s best environmentally conscious, adults-only Caribbean escape at Kanan Tulum

description: Located in Tulum, 6.3 km from Tulum Archeological Site, Majaro Hotel Tulum provides accommodation with a terrace, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a concierge service and free WiFi. The accommodation features airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available. At the hotel, the rooms are equipped with a patio. Each room is fitted with a coffee machine and a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, while selected rooms are equipped with a kitchen equipped with a fridge. At Majaro Hotel Tulum the rooms are fitted with air conditioning and a safety deposit box. An American breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Spa and wellness facilities are at guests' disposal during their stay at Majaro Hotel Tulum, including an indoor pool and on-request massage treatments. Tulum Bus station is 2.7 km from the hotel, while Parque Nacional Tulum is 4.8 km away. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 81 km from Majaro Hotel Tulum.

name: Hotel Muaré & Spa Tulum
address: Calle 7 Pte Mz 43 Lt 01, 77760 Tulum, Quintana Roo

description: Akumal Natura is set in Akumal, 1.7 km from the Akumal Bay. The hotel is located in the jungle and has a sun terrace and views of the garden, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant. All 20 bungalows include a patio/terrace for your convenience. A natural pool is also featured at the property. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. The resort offers free WiFi available at the lobby, restaurant and in all rooms. Guests can enjoy various activities in the surroundings, including golfing, snorkeling, diving and hiking. The hotel also offers free use of bicycles. Xcacel-Xcacelito is 8 km from Akumal Natura, while Akumal Bay is 1.7 km away. The nearest airport is Cancun International Airport.

address: Avenida Coba Entre 2 y 4 Oriente, Centro., 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Situated conveniently in the centre of Tulum, Hostal Del Jaguar offers air-conditioned rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a restaurant. Offering a bar, the property is located within 3 km of Tulum Archeological Site. The accommodation features room service, a tour desk and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a desk. The units feature bed linen. Tulum Bus station is 1.5 km from Hostal Del Jaguar, while Bus station Tulum Ruins is 2.2 km away. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 77 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: FlowSuites Condesa
address: Av. Nuevo Leon No. 108, Colonia Hipódromo, 06100 Mexico City, Mexico City Federal District
description: A chic hotel in Condesa Discerning business and leisure travelers seeking privacy, tranquility and comfort know where to stay when visiting Mexico City. Located on one of the most famous streets in La Condesa, FlowSuites offers a luxury, adults only sanctuary among boutique hotels in Mexico City.From here it’s just moments to the city’s top attractions and corporate destinations, making us the ideal business and social hub. Feel completely at home in expansive, apartment-style suites featuring a chic, contemporary décor. Start your morning with our complimentary, hot continental breakfast buffet and unwind with cocktails at our rooftop bar and terrace, where you’ll sip and socialize with panoramic views of Mexico City. Treat yourself to a relaxing therapy at Flow Spa or get invigorated with a workout in our on-site gym. Experience FlowSuites Hotel just once and you’ll agree this is the place to stay every time when you’re in Mexico City.Official Hotel Information

address: AV Insurgentes Sur 710, Mexico City, Mexico City Federal District

With a Mexican and Mediterranean fusion food restaurant, social bar, fitness center, spacious boardroom, rooms for up to four people, and suites, it is in the iconic Colonia del Valle, an ideal location close to numerous restaurants and shops.accorhotels.com

name: Courtyard by Marriott Mexico City Airport
address: Sinaloa 31, Penon de los Banos, 15520 Mexico City, Mexico City Federal District
description: Whatever the reason for your travels, Courtyard Mexico City Airport offers a modern experience you won't soon forget. Conveniently stay within the walls of Mexico City International Airport, also known as Benito Juárez International Airport. Our Mexico City airport hotel welcomes you to a prime location near beloved attractions, such as Autódromo Hermanos Rodríguez, Foro Sol and Palacio de los Deportes. After you've maxed out on exploration, seek comfort in spacious rooms with complimentary Wi-Fi, soundproof windows and plush mattresses. Start your day with a delicious meal at our on-site restaurant, serving an international menu of local dishes. Come back for dinner to enjoy delectable plates and evening cocktails. Utilize one of the seven event rooms in our hotel in Mexico City Airport for your business or social gathering. Each one is complete with modern equipment, catering menus and high-speed Wi-Fi. Transform any trip into a relaxing getaway at Courtyard Mexico City Airport.Marriott

name: Hotel del Principado
address: Londres 42 Col. Juarez Zona Rosa, 06600 Mexico City, Mexico City Federal District
description: Situated in the heart of Mexico City's Zona Rosa, a popular tourist and business location, this hotel features comfortable accommodations, only seconds away from all the action of the city. The Hotel del Principado ideally places guests within walking distance to many of the area's top attractions. A number of art galleries, restaurants, nightclubs, boutiques, museums and theaters and right outside the hotel's front doors. Guests at the Principado can also enjoy a variety of modern conveniences, including a state-of-the-art business center, a gourmet restaurant and an on-site currency exchange services.

name: Four Points by Sheraton Mexico City, Colonia Roma
address: Alvaro Obregon No. 38, Mexico City, Mexico City Federal District
description: Discover business or vacation unlike any other at Four Points by Sheraton Mexico City, Colonia Roma, where enduring classics are interwoven with 21st-century amenities. Whether you want to go on a shopping spree in Condesa, retrace the city's rich history in the historic center of Mexico City or gaze upon some of Mexico's tallest buildings at Paseo de la Reforma, you'll find exactly what your heart desires just moments from our Roma Norte hotel. Once you've worked up an appetite, make your way to Restaurant Sarabela, our on-site restaurant. From breakfast through dinner, it serves a mouthwatering array of Mexican cuisine, paired with handcrafted cocktails and unforgettable views of the city. Retire to the comfort of your room or suite, complete with a pillowtop mattress, flat-panel TV, 24-hour room service and complimentary Wi-Fi. Reinvent your travels at Four Points by Sheraton Mexico City, Colonia Roma.Marriott

name: W Mexico City

description: W Mexico City is located off Reforma Boulevard in the stylish Polanco neighborhood where trend-seekers meet to explore chic shops, a fast-paced cultural landscape and tempting nightlife. It features custom details defining an extraordinary experience. Stay at our family-friendly hotel in Polanco, Mexico City and enjoy the sleek furnishings and signature touches in our 237 sparkling guest rooms and suites. Keep your Polanco party going at the Living Room Bar that oozes daring décor and quenches the thirst of many with the most innovative signature cocktail collection in the city. Perfect for work and play, W Mexico City offers everything you need for a spectacular event with fresh, innovative hotel spaces. With nine meeting studios totaling 7,700 square feet of space, we can set up events for anywhere from 10 to 340 guests at our hotel in Mexico City.Marriott

name: The St. Regis Mexico City
address: Paseo de la Reforma 439, 06500 Mexico City, Mexico City Federal District
description: Standing proudly along tree-lined Paseo de la Reforma, The St. Regis Mexico City is a sanctuary in one of the most exciting destinations in the world. Soaring 31 stories above the city bustle, this family-friendly hotel in Mexico City escorts elegance into the modern era, elevating an otherwise typical hotel experience to a higher standard that reflects the evolution of this world-famous metropolis. Anticipate refined spaces with nods to the rich local culture of Mexico City, meticulously crafted and brought to life by renowned butler services. Rest in the privacy of impeccably appointed, pet-friendly hotel accommodations, each providing plush bedding, immaculate marble bathrooms and floor-to-ceiling windows. Choose from seven dining experiences with a variety of cuisines at our Colonia Cuauhtémoc hotel. Luxuriate with restorative treatments at Remède Spa or lounge by an indoor pool with awe-inspiring views of the city skyline. The St. Regis Mexico City helps you transform and makes every day extraordinary.Marriott

name: Hyatt Regency Mexico City
address: Campos Eliseos No. 204 Polanco, 11560 Mexico City, Mexico City Federal District
description: Situated next to Chapultepec Park in the stylish Polanco neighbourhood, Hyatt Regency Mexico City offers elegant modern rooms, 3 on-site restaurants and 2 bars. There is also a business centre. Each air-conditioned room offers smart contemporary décor and views of the city or park. Rooms have cable TV and a coffee maker. Bathrooms include a hairdryer, bathrobes and toiletries. Wi-Fi connection is free of charge in the rooms and at public areas. The hotel’s Rulfo Paraje Latino serves the best of the Latin-American cuisine. Teppan Grill offers Teppanyaki-style grilled meat and seafood, while the sophisticated Yoshimi Japanese restaurant includes a peaceful Zen garden. Check out the Amado traditional Bakery and Mexican sweet shop. Hyatt Regency Mexico City is located next to the National Auditorium and Auditorio Metro Station. The National Anthropology Museum, Chapultepec Lake and the exclusive Presidente Masaryk Avenue are within a 10-minute walk.

name: Le Méridien Mexico City
address: Paseo De La Reforma 69, 06030 Mexico City, Mexico City Federal District
description: Rising above the timeless length of the Paseo de la Reforma, Le Méridien Mexico City stands at the intersection of culture and business. Find many of the city's renowned museums and mural-adorned palaces within easy reach of our luxury hotel. Our all-suite hotel provides travelers in Mexico City with pet-friendly accommodations, spacious bathrooms and soundproof windows. Take advantage of additional hotel amenities like our 24-hour fitness center, all-day dining restaurant and Latitude Bar. Le Méridien Mexico City complements the stay of each of our curious and sophisticated guests.Marriott

name: Sheraton Mexico City Maria Isabel Hotel
address: Paseo de la Reforma 325, 06500 Mexico City, Mexico City Federal District
description: Enrich your trip to Zona Rosa. Sheraton Mexico City Maria Isabel Hotel is located on the famed Avenida Paseo de la Reforma only steps away from dynamic shopping, dining and nightlife. Stroll down the avenue to The Angel of Independence and walk a little further for lush greenery at Bosque de Chapultepec. Head in the other direction for Spanish colonial façades at the Historic Center, home to the National Palace, Palacio de Bellas Artes and Metropolitan Cathedral. At our five-star hotel, sit down to a gourmet meal at our Italian restaurant or cocktails at our lounge and lobby bar. To help you recharge, we offer a heated outdoor pool and a Sheraton Fitness center with a sauna, cardio equipment and free weights. As the day winds to a close, slip off to a stylish, pet-friendly hotel room or suite with cityscape views and Sheraton Signature Sleep Experience beds. Your trip to Zona Rosa, Mexico City, is whatever you make it at Sheraton Mexico City Maria Isabel Hotel.Marriott

description: Set in Mexico City, 15 km from Chapultepec Forest, Hyatt House Mexico City Santa Fe features a fitness centre. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel has a terrace and a bar. Antara Polanco is reachable within 15 km. Guest rooms come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, an oven, a coffee machine, a shower and a desk. Every room is equipped with a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hair dryer. At the hotel every room has a seating area. A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the property. The restaurant at Hyatt House Mexico City specialises in International cuisine. You can play billiards at this 4-star hotel. Other services and facilities offered at the accommodation include a business centre, an ATM machine and newspapers. Staff at the 24-hour front desk speak English and Spanish. National Museum of Anthropology is 15 km from Hyatt House Mexico City Santa Fe. The nearest airport is Benito Juarez International Airport, 26 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Puerto México Aeropuerto

They all have private bathrooms that include a shower and toilet. On-site laundry services are available at an extra cost. There is a restaurant serving Argentine food just 20 metres from the property, and guests will find other dining options within a 15-minute drive. The ancient pyramids of Teotihuacan are a 1-hour drive from Hospedaje Puerto Mexico Aeropuerto, while guests can reach the Basilica de Guadalupe within a 30-minute drive. The Polanco business district is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Mexico City Santa Fe
address: Calle 3 #55 Col Lomas de Santa Fe, 01219 Mexico City, Mexico City Federal District
description: Our rooms are adjacent to Expo Santa Fe convention center, two kilometers from Centro Comercial Santa Fe. We have a fitness center and over 22,400 sq. ft. of meeting space shared with our sister DoubleTree hotel.Hilton

name: St Isidro Suites Corporate Housing Spa & Wellness Center

The spacious apartments have elegant décor with dark wood furniture. Bathrooms come with toiletries and bathrobes. The modern kitchenette features a dishwasher, ceramic hob and microwave. You can also enjoy international meals in the Encuentro Cantina Mexicana restaurant and café. St. Isidro Corporate Housing is 600 metres from the National Conservatory of Music. Zocalo Square and the Alameda Park are around 8 km away. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide you with information about the city.

name: Hotel Carlota
address: Rio Amazonas No. 73, 06500 Mexico City, Mexico City Federal District

The rooms come with a flat-screen cable TV and private bathroom with shower. Some of the rooms come with a terrace or balcony and pool views. There is a 24-hour front desk and shops at the property. Free parking on site is also available. United States Embassy is 400 metres from Hotel Carlota, while Zona Rosa is 1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Benito Juárez Airport, 9.5 km from the property.

name: Four Seasons Hotel Mexico City
address: Paseo De La Reforma 500, 06600 Mexico City, Mexico City Federal District
description: Near Chapultepec Park and situated on Paseo de la Reforma in downtown Mexico City, this AAA Five Diamond Award winner hotel offers a full-service spa, an on-site restaurant and contemporary guest rooms with flat-screen TVs. Additional services, such as a helpful concierge and 24-hour business services, ensure an enjoyable stay. An English-style barbershop, Gentleman's Tonic, is also available. The guest rooms at the Mexico D.F. Four Seasons boast private bars, flat-screen TVs and sitting areas. In the afternoon, guests can relax in the soaking tub or use the in-room wireless internet access for an additional fee. Becco servces Italian cuisine, while Pan Dulce pastry shop combines traditional Mexican bread with French pastries. Guest can order drinks at El Bar or enjoy a Champagne tasting every Wednesday.

name: Downtown
address: Isabel La Catolica 30, 06010 Mexico City, Mexico City Federal District
description: Located 2 blocks from the Zócalo Square, this elegant design hotel is set in a restored 17th-century palace. It offers an outdoor pool and roof terrace with wonderful views over Mexico City. Downtown has an ideal setting in the historic city centre, a 5-minute walk from the Metropolitan Cathedral and the Mexican Government Palace. Zócalo Metro Station is 400 metres away. Rooms at Downtown have high ceilings and traditional tiled floors. Each stylish room includes free WiFi and a flat-screen TV, as well as a minibar and a safe. Downtown offers an à la carte restaurant and a bar with a terrace, overlooking the city. You can also relax in the hotel’s courtyard garden. Staff at the 24-hour reception are happy to arrange excursions, airport transfers and car hire. Free bicycle rental is offered. Valet parking service available with an extra charge.

With a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at Orgánico Hotel Boutique also feature a city view. At the accommodation the rooms come with bed linen and towels. National Cinematheque is 20 km from Orgánico Hotel Boutique, while Frida Kahlo House Museum is 20 km from the property. The nearest airport is Benito Juarez International Airport, 37 km from the hotel.

name: The Westin Guadalajara

description: The second largest city in Mexico and the capital of the state of Jalisco, Guadalajara is a vibrant, vital city encompassing modern urban development, colonial architecture and a rich cultural heritage. The Westin Guadalajara is perfectly integrated into this graceful metropolis full of tree-lined avenues and fountains offering pet-friendly hotel rooms for traveling groups and families. Located in the prestigious Residencial del Bosque district directly across from Expo Guadalajara convention center, a major venue for events, exhibitions, congresses and conventions, The Westin Guadalajara helps you hit your stride with a convenient location near La Perla, Plaza del Sol and Grand Plaza, World Trade Center and Jewelry Center, parks, corporate offices and more.Marriott

Encircling a picturesque courtyard, our hotel offers curated experiences with a local vibe Savor Mexican cuisine at JAL Cocina de Raíz or pop up to the rooftop bar with sweeping views. Host a meeting or event in our versatile venues and ballroom. Relax in refreshed rooms with premium bedding. From fitness to dining, enjoy an enriching stay.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: JW Marriott Hotel Guadalajara
address: Mar Baltico 2242 Colonia Country Club, 44610 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Surround yourself with refined luxury at JW Marriott Hotel Guadalajara, where a truly enriching getaway awaits. Located in the city of Guadalajara, Jalisco, our luxury hotel offers easy access to a host of business offices, as well as shopping and entertainment options. Soak up the sun as you take a dip in our pool and enjoy unobstructed views of Guadalajara. Delight your palate with our various restaurant options – including Zibu, which draws upon the cuisines of Thailand and Mexico. After an exciting day in the city, settle in to your spacious, pet-friendly room or suite, boasting luxury bedding and sophisticated décor. After an eventful day, sip a glass of champagne while relaxing on the Sunset Deck, our exclusive rooftop bar. From chef-made specialties to modern rooms, JW Marriott Hotel Guadalajara focuses on your well-being.Marriott

name: Quinta Don Jose Boutique Hotel
address: Calle Reforma No. 139, 45500 Guadalajara, Jalisco

Each room here will provide you with a TV, air conditioning and cable channels. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a bath or shower and a hairdryer. name: ibis Guadalajara Expo

description: The ibis Guadalajara Expo hotel is located in the financial district, opposite the Expo Guadalajara, close to the WTC and the Plaza del Sol, 10 minutes from the historic center and just 30 minutes from the airport. It has 159 modern, soundproofed rooms with air-conditioning available for reservation. The hotel serves a full buffet breakfast every day and has a restaurant, a bar with a 24/7 snack service, free 30 MG asynchronous wireless Internet access, a private car park and 3 meeting rooms.accorhotels.com

name: AC Hotel by Marriott Guadalajara, Mexico
address: Avenida de Las Americas 1500, 44610 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Our hotel in Guadalajara, Mexico, leaves a lasting impression. Located in the heart of the city's financial district, AC Hotel Guadalajara, Mexico is situated close to historical attractions such as Guadalajara Cathedral and Zapopan, where a wealth of entertainment options awaits. Between adventures to our golf courses, tennis courts and hiking trails, settle into a stylish, pet-friendly hotel room or suite offering thoughtful amenities such as a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. Start your day with energizing breakfasts at AC Kitchen and join us in the evening at AC Lounge for signature cocktails from an expert mixologist. Host corporate meetings and special occasions in one of our three customizable conference rooms or stay active at our on-site fitness center. After a busy day of sightseeing or meetings, take a dip in our infinity pool with spectacular views of Jalisco. Our staff at AC Hotel Guadalajara, Mexico works hard to ensure you have an exceptional stay.Marriott

Each room boasts a residential feel and offers all the comforts of home, with hi-tech amenities, a soothing color palette, and designer décor. Other amenities include a desk area. The hotel also boasts an indoor pool and fitness centre. name: Hotel Next

The accommodation provides a shared kitchen, room service and organising tours for guests. Every room is equipped with a desk and a flat-screen TV, and certain rooms at the hotel have a balcony. Speaking English and Spanish at the reception, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical guidance on the area. Jalisco Stadium is 7.8 km from Hotel NEXT, while Guadalajara Cathedral is 8.5 km away. The nearest airport is Guadalajara Airport, 25 km from the accommodation.

The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel La Mansion del Sol feature free Wi-Fi, flat-screen cable TV and a coffee maker. Each one has a private bathroom with a hairdryer, bathrobe and slippers. Looking out onto the garden, the hotel’s Los Colibrís Restaurant serves traditional Mexican food. There is also a bar where you can get a snack or a drink. The hotel offers free valet parking. Don Miguel Hidalgo y Costilla Airport is a 25-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Laffayette Ejecutivo

Mexican and international cuisine is on offer for dinner. Hotel Lafayette is less than 500 metres from the US Consulate and the University of Guadalajara. The Mex 80 and 54 Motorways can be reached in 5 minutes, by car.

address: Av. Ignacio L. Vallarta 5145, 45040 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Located in Guadalajara, 7 km from Guadalajara Cathedral, Hard Rock Hotel Guadalajara features an outdoor swimming pool, as well as free WiFi. 10 km from Jalisco Stadium and 4.9 km from Expo Guadalajara, the property features a fitness centre and a garden. The accommodation provides evening entertainment and a 24-hour front desk. At the hotel, all rooms include a desk and a flat-screen TV. Each room is fitted with a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hair dryer. All rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a coffee machine. Hard Rock Hotel Guadalajara offers a sauna. Guests have access to the on-site business centre and can use the on-site ATM machine.
