name: Hotel Guadalajara Country Club by HNF
address: Av De Las Americas 1528, 44610 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Set in a prime location of Guadalajara, Aloft Guadalajara puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The property offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Aloft Guadalajara. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Aloft Guadalajara is an excellent choice from which to explore Guadalajara or to simply relax and rejuvenate.priceline.com

name: Hotel Boutique La Mansión Guadalajara
address: 1369 Av. Chapalita Chapalita, 44500 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Set in Guadalajara, 5.1 km from Expiatorio Temple, Hotel Boutique La Mansión Guadalajara offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can make use of a bar. All rooms are complete with a private bathroom and air conditioning, and certain rooms here will provide you with a balcony. Guests at the hotel can enjoy a continental breakfast. You can play squash at Hotel Boutique La Mansión Guadalajara. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Guadalajara Expo, Plaza del Sol and Guadalajara World Trade Center. The nearest airport is Guadalajara Airport, 18 km from Hotel Boutique La Mansión Guadalajara.

name: La Villa Del Ensueño
address: Florida 305, 45500 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: This boutique hotel is located in Tlaquepaque, just 20 minutes' drive from Guadalajara International Airport. La Villa de Ensueno features a hot breakfast, air conditioning and 2 outdoor pools. Rooms at the Hotel Boutique La Villa del Ensueno are spacious and uniquely decorated. They offer cable TV and private bathrooms. Some rooms feature hot tubs and private balconies. La Villa del Ensueno features traditional, Mexican décor and free Wi-Fi. The concierge desk can help arrange tours and ticket reservations. Business services and free on-site parking are also offered. La Villa del Ensueno Boutique Hotel is 4 blocks from the center of Tlaquepaque. Guests can visit the Museo Pantalon Panduro Art Museum and the Metropolitan Cathedral. Tonala is a 20-minute drive from the hotel and has open air markets.

name: Villa Ganz Boutique Hotel
address: Lopez Cotilla, 1739, 44140 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: This Guadalajara hotel is situated in a restored mansion and features a garden, a free daily newspaper in the lobby and wine and canapés served daily from 18:00 to 20:00. Each spacious suite at Villa Ganz Boutique Hotel includes cable TV and free Wi-Fi, most suites boast a balcony. Every air-conditioned suite provides a safety deposit box. Slippers are included and select suites also offer a DVD player. Upon arrival, guests will receive a welcome drink and a bottle of wine. Villa Ganz is steps from shopping, dining and cultural events.

name: Becquer Hotel Guadalajara
address: Av. Guadalupe 596, Chapalita, 44500 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Set in Guadalajara, 5 km from Expiatorio Temple, Becquer Hotel Guadalajara offers accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is located 5.2 km from Jose Cuervo Express Train. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Becquer Hotel Guadalajara all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an American breakfast. Guests can make use of the business centre or relax in the bar. Guadalajara Cathedral is 6.6 km from Becquer Hotel Guadalajara, while Cabanas Cultural Institute is 7.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Guadalajara Airport, 19 km from the hotel.

name: AC Hotel by Marriott Guadalajara Expo
address: Av Lopez Mateos Sur No 2375, 45050 Zapopan, Jalisco
description: AC Hotel Guadalajara Expo is your new choice when traveling to beautiful Guadalajara, Mexico. Our Hotel is designed with Spanish roots and European soul, offering exceptional experience of service; while staying at our Hotel in Guadalajara you will find a unique combination of quality, modern design, comfort and authenticity. Privileged with an excellent location just 5 minutes distance from Expo Guadalajara, one of the most important Convention Centers in Latin America, easy access to the industrial district (Southern side), near to important growth-business areas in Zapopan and surrounded by multiple leisure venues. Get to know our AC Lounge and Restaurant with Spanish perspective offering international and local vanguard mixology together with our delicious Tapas, all designed to connect with AC Community. Reserve with us and enjoy your stay.Marriott

name: Hotel Portonovo Plaza Expo
address: Av Lopez Mateos Sur 2400, 45050 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Situated in Guadalajara, 6.5 km from Expiatorio Temple, Hotel Expo Plaza features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. The property is around 6.7 km from Jose Cuervo Express Train, 8.2 km from Guadalajara Cathedral and 9 km from Cabanas Cultural Institute. This pet-friendly hotel also has free WiFi. All rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. At Hotel Expo Plaza, the rooms come with air conditioning and a private bathroom. Speaking English and Spanish at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always on hand to help. Jalisco Stadium is 12 km from the accommodation, while Guadalajara Zoo is 16 km from the property. The nearest airport is Guadalajara Airport, 18 km from Hotel Expo Plaza.

name: Mvngata Beach Hotel
address: Cerrada Zona Costera lote 21, manzana 91, 77727 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Located in Playa del Carmen, Mvngata Beach Hotel provides accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a bar. Among the various facilities of this property are a shared lounge, a garden and a private beach area. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, room service and currency exchange for guests. All units are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a coffee machine, a shower, a hairdryer and a wardrobe. At the hotel every room comes with a private bathroom with free toiletries. A à la carte breakfast is available daily at Mvngata Beach Hotel. The accommodation offers a terrace. Cancun International Airport is 51 km from the property.

name: Etéreo, Auberge Resorts Collection
address: Paseo Kanai 16, 77730 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Set in Playa del Carmen, a few steps from Playa Virgen, Etéreo, Auberge Resorts Collection offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. This 5-star hotel offers a bar. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. Guests at the hotel can enjoy an American breakfast. Chablé Maroma Beach is a few steps from Etéreo, Auberge Resorts Collection, while ADO International Bus Station is 20 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 44 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Xcaret Arte - Adults Only
address: Carr. Chetumal - Puerto Juárez Km. 282, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Located in Playa del Carmen, 8.8 km from Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal, Hotel Xcaret Arte - All Parks All Fun Inclusive - Adults Only provides accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Providing a restaurant, the property also has a terrace, as well as a sauna and a hot tub. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel offers certain rooms with sea views, and each room is equipped with a balcony. Guest rooms at Hotel Xcaret Arte - All Parks All Fun Inclusive - Adults Only include air conditioning and a wardrobe. Breakfast is available daily, and includes continental, vegan and gluten-free options. You can play tennis at this 5-star hotel, and the area is popular for snorkelling and cycling. ADO International Bus Station is 9 km from the accommodation, while Church of Guadalupe is 11 km away. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 27 km from Hotel Xcaret Arte - All Parks All Fun Inclusive - Adults Only.

name: Maroma, A Belmond Hotel, Riviera Maya
address: Carretera Cancun Tulum Km 51, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Spend the day catching some rays at Maroma, A Belmond Hotel, Riviera Maya's private sand beach, relaxing by one of the aparthotel's 3 outdoor swimming pools, or pampering yourself at the full-service spa. Each apartment features free WiFi, a furnished patio, and a pillowtop bed. Comforts include premium bedding and a pillow menu, and guests will also appreciate thoughtful touches like bathrobes and slippers.Expedia

name: Secrets Moxché Playa del Carmen
address: Carretera Playa del Carmen-Cancun KM 294, Corasol, 77714 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Exquisite taste and exotic views will capture your heart at Secrets Moxché. Escape into luxury™ in the heart of the Riviera Maya, just a 10-minute drive from Playa del Carmen's famed Quinta Avenida (Fifth Avenue), and indulge with an expansive and unique array of international cuisine. Set on a pristine strip of white sandy beach, all of our 485 lavish suites offer a contemporary experience with an earthy feel including luxurious amenities, stunning views, an in-room rolling bar, all complete with our signature Unlimited-Luxury® experience.WebBeds

name: Banyan Tree Mayakoba
address: Carretera Federal Chetumal Puerto Juarez Km 298, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Live a unique experience in an exclusive resort in the Riviera Maya, Banyan Tree Mayakoba Triple AAA 5 Diamond resort has private villas with swimming pools surrounded by vegetation offering you a stay of luxury and harmony. Diamond resort, because we believe in our mission: to offer you the most memorable vacations of your life and a simply unforgettable experience.accorhotels.com

name: The St. Regis Kanai Resort, Riviera Maya
address: Paseo Kanai 15, 77730 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Discover an exceptional address at The St. Regis Kanai Resort, Riviera Maya. We offer you a central location near Cancun and Playa Del Carmen. Find our vacation resort built on a natural mangrove reserve, with a setting inspired by the neighboring Sian Ka’an Reserve, a UNESCO World Heritage Site in Quintana Roo. Take in sweeping ocean views from a 620-acre reserve set on the shores of Mexico’s Yucatan Peninsula. The Pleiades constellation inspired the circular architecture of our resort's avant-garde exterior, which floats above the canopy of the mangrove trees below. Each of our 124 rooms, suites and residences boasts dramatic views, along with bespoke furniture and a private terrace or plunge pool. Reserve one of our vacation packages and revel in our resort's unique range of culinary destinations and other experiences. From our signature St. Regis Butler Service to the state-of-the-art St. Regis Spa, every touchpoint allows time to stand still in this undiscovered slice of paradise in Mexico.Marriott

name: Impression Moxché by Secrets
address: Carr Tulum Playa Del Carmen km 294, 77714 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Set in Playa del Carmen, 1.3 km from Playa del Carmen Beach, Impression Moxché by Secrets - Adults Only offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. 11 km from ADO International Bus Station and 11 km from Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal, the property provides a private beach area, as well as a bar. The accommodation features room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. Certain rooms will provide you with a kitchenette with a minibar. The daily breakfast offers continental, Full English/Irish or American options. At the resort you will find a restaurant serving French, Italian and Japanese cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. You can play billiards, table tennis and tennis at this 5-star resort, and the area is popular for golfing. Guests can sing karaoke, plan their trips at the tour desk, or make use of the business centre. Church of Guadalupe is 7.4 km from Impression Moxché by Secrets - Adults Only, while Kantenah Bay is 41 km away. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 43 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Thompson Beach House
address: Calle 8 y Playa, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: With a stay at Thompson Beach House - a concept by Hyatt in Playa del Carmen (Downtown Playa del Carmen), you'll be steps from Playa del Carmen Main Beach and Quinta Avenida. Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Porto Playa Condo Hotel and Beach Club
address: 1 Avenida Norte Esquina 16 Norte Bis, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a sauna and a pool, as well as a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and a stovetop. Other amenities include Egyptian cotton sheets, premium bedding, laundry facilities, and a freezer.Expedia

name: Thompson Playa Del Carmen - Adults Only
address: 5ta Avenida Norte Por 12, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, Thompson Playa del Carmen is located in Playa del Carmen, 300 metres from 28 de Julio Square. The hotel has a year-round outdoor pool and fitness centre, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and is equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Certain units include a seating area to relax in after a busy day. For your comfort, you will find bath robes and free toiletries. You can engage in various activities, such as snorkeling and windsurfing. The hotel also offers bike hire and car hire. Guests will have access to Tequila or Mezcal tasting, daily bottled water and a faster WiFi connection. ADO International Bus Station is 700 metres from Thompson Playa del Carmen, while Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal is 900 metres away. The nearest airport is Cancun International Airport.

Amenities Enjoy recreational amenities such as a water park (surcharge) and a spa tub. name: Hotel Xcaret Mexico - All Parks / All Fun Inclusive
address: Carr. Chetumal - Puerto Juarez Km. 282, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Chablé Maroma
address: Carretera Federal 307 Km 51 Punta Maroma, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Situated in Playa del Carmen, 17 km from ADO International Bus Station, Chablé Maroma provides rooms with air conditioning. Offering a restaurant, the property also has a private beach area, as well as a hot tub. Both free WiFi and private parking are available on site. All guest rooms at Chablé Maroma are fitted with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a shower. Chablé Maroma features certain units that include a terrace, and each room has a coffee machine. All rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. A la carte breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Daily activities such as yoga classes and unlimited access to the Spa and Gym. Speaking English and Spanish, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area at the reception. Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal is 17 km from Chablé Maroma, while Church of Guadalupe is 14 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cancun International Airport, 40 km from Chablé Maroma.

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Playa del Carmen
address: Retorno 50 Avenida Sur, Carretera 307 Cancun Tulum Chetumal Cancun, Solidaridad, 77717 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Conveniently located in the heart of Riviera Maya, the Residence Inn Playa del Carmen offers easy access to all major business and leisure hubs. Whether you're with us for a few days, a few weeks, or a few months, your daily routine matters. Our 149 stylish fully furnished studios, one-bedroom, two-bedroom suites feature fully equipped kitchens along with flexible space to work and live. Our complimentary breakfast making it easy to start every morning just the way you like it. The Market in the lobby is open 24h a day to grab a snack and satisfy your cravings day or night. Want to try out a new recipe in the comfort of your home? Why not use our complimentary grocery delivery service. To balance work and play, relax by the pool overlooking the golf course or make it your office for the day. At our hotel in Playa del Carmen, Mexico, you can work out on your terms without constraints at our gym or using our curated RI Runs Routes on MapMyFitness. Pets are allowed at our hotel too!Marriott

name: The Fives Downtown Hotel & Residences, Curio Collection by Hilton
address: Avenida 10 Calle 2, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: The Fives Downtown is the picture-perfect retreat for your AAA Four Diamond Caribbean escapade. With 133 spacious residence-style suites, this hotel reflects the beauty of contemporary Mexican high design and the Mayan Riviera charm. Our enchanting hotel has a particular way of making you enjoy our Sensory Hospitality in every detail, from our impeccable service and avant-garde facilities to the wide variety of activities and experiences it provides for every kind of guest. Delight your senses with the majestic view of its rooftop, simply the best of the city. Swim in its incredible infinity pools while enjoying the best mixology, or relax to the fullest and revitalize the body, mind, and spirit at our world-class spa. Enjoy the city's best breakfasts at Mercatto, with balanced dishes prepared with the region's freshest ingredients. Do you want to enjoy Mexican folklore. At Cantina El Tigre, you can savor more than 100 tequila and mezcal brands and the city's best tacos. Additionally, thanks to its state-of-the-art meeting rooms, this property is an ideal destination to host events, from executive conferences and business meetings to the most exquisite parties and social occasions. Thanks to its privileged location, our hotel allows its guests to enjoy the pulsating nightlife, delightful eateries, and endless boutiques of Playa del Carmen's Quinta Avenida, ideal for even the most experienced travelers and shoppers. At The Fives Downtown, we take care of every detail to make your vacation experience in the Caribbean something worth remembering.Hilton

name: Hotel Esencia
address: Carretera Cancún-Tulum Km. 265, 77750 Xpu Há, Quintana Roo
description: Offering direct access to Xpu-Ha Beach, Hotel Esencia offers beautiful rooms and suites with terraces set amongst attractive gardens. It features a spa, 2 large outdoor swimming pools and an à la carte restaurant. All air-conditioned accommodation has bright, attractive décor. Each suite and room has a flat-screen TV and an iPod docking station. The Garden Restaurant serves a selection of regional and international cuisine. The hotel also offers Mexican cookery classes. The Esencia’s spa features a plunge pool, sauna and hot tub. Treatments include massage and facials. The Riviera Maya coastline is ideal for diving and snorkelling. Guests can visit the Mayan ruins at Tulum, as well as the resort of Playa del Carmen, which can be reached within 15 minutes by car.

name: Anah Suites by Sunest
address: Avenida 20 entre calle 16 Norte y calle 14 norte centro, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Offering an outdoor pool, plus a spa and wellness centre, Anah Suites by Sunest is located in the heart of Playa del Carmen. It offers a children’s playground and free WiFi. The apartments are modern, boasting a minimalistic style. All are fully appointed and have an equipped kitchen. A safe that fits a lap top, TV and bed linen are included. Vibrant and popular 5th Avenue, where many restaurants, bars and shops are located, can be reached in a short 5-minute walk. Guest can also go to the large supermarket located 200 metres away to buy supplies for cooking en-suite. At Anah Suites by Sunest you will find a fitness centre. Other facilities like a games room, a tour desk and luggage storage are offered. The property offers free parking. Mamitas Beach Club is 1.2 km from Anah Suites by Sunest. Xcaret Eco-Theme Park is only 15 minutes’ drive away.

name: Heaven at Hard Rock Hotel Riviera Maya - Adults Only
address: Km. 72 Carretera Cancun-Tulum, 77710 Puerto Aventuras, Quintana Roo
description: This stylish holiday resort is located in one of the most impressive and inspiring places of the world, right next to the beach and facing the warm waters of the Caribbean Sea. The resort offers an authentic rock star lifestyle experience for adults only and has its own private beach as well as various swimming pools. The guest rooms are tastefully decorated and feature high-quality amenities, such as a relaxing hydro spa tub for couples, which will ensure an unforgettable stay on the Riviera Maya. Travellers who stay in this hotel may enjoy exquisite national and international cuisine choosing between different on-site restaurants and bars. The establishment boasts a wide range of activities and leisure options during the day, and when the sun goes down guests may enjoy fantastic parties with professional DJ's. The spa, with its huge variety of treatments, is the best place to relax and recharge batteries after being dancing all night.FarePortal

name: Bluebay Grand Esmeralda
address: Carr. Chetumal - Puerto Juárez Km 300, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: The hotel is located on the Riviera Mayan about 15 minutes north of Playa del Carmen, with its restaurants, bars, exciting nightlife and shopping opportunities, and 35 minutes from Cancun International Airport. Links to public transport can be found 15 min from the hotel. Property located on 180-acres of beachfront overlooking the azure waters of Mexico's beautiful Mayan RivieraWebBeds

name: Aspira Hotel Playa del Carmen
address: Calle 16 Norte Entre 10 y 15 Avenida, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Featuring free WiFi in all areas, an outdoor pool and a terrace, Aspira Hotel Playa del Carmen offers accommodation in Playa del Carmen, with walking distance to the main shopping malls, restaurants, bars & night clubs. Every room has a flat-screen TV. A terrace or balcony are featured in certain rooms. Each room comes with a private bathroom fitted with a shower. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hair dryer. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property and an on-site restaurant. La Ceiba Bar & Buffet offers breakfast, lunch and dinner, features a variety of beverages and a terrace and the hotel is located 3 minutes walking distance to the beach. ADO International Bus Station is 900 metres from Aspira Hotel Playa del Carmen, while Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal is 1.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 20 km from the property.

name: The Riviera Maya EDITION (SM) at Kanai
address: Paseo Kanai 14, 77730 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Located on a pristine beachfront site, in the blissful stretch of Caribbean coastline, The Riviera Maya EDITION at Kanai features 182 guestrooms and suites situated within the luxurious Kanai development, and home to five food and beverage outlets including a signature restaurant, pool bar and beach club, destination spa and an expansive 4000 sqm Penthouse Suite. In addition to multiple meeting spaces, the hotel also houses an extensive outdoor deck for large-scale events and parties. The Riviera Maya EDITION at Kanai is the first property in Mexico, proud representative of the collection of individualized, customized, one-of-a-kind hotels conceived by Ian Schrager in collaboration with Marriott International.Marriott

name: Viceroy Riviera Maya, a Luxury Villa Resort
address: Playa Xcalacoco Frac 7, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Located on the coast of Xcalacoco Beach 10 minutes outside of Playa del Carmen, this luxury resort and spa situated in the tropical rainforest features a restaurant. The villas at Viceroy Riviera Maya are furnished with a private kidney-shaped pool and flat-screen TVs with DVD players. Free Wi-Fi is provided and room service is available. This pet-friendly resort hosts a spa and wellness centre offering a hot tub, steam room, and personal massages. Yoga classes take place on the beach. A gym and outdoor pool are also part of the resort’s facilities. A concierge service is available. The passenger ferry to Cozumel is less than 15 minutes from Viceroy Riviera Maya. Xcaret Eco Park is less than 20 minutes from the resort.

name: Andaz Mayakoba a Concept By Hyatt - All Inclusive
address: Carretera Federal Cancun - Playa Del Carmen Km 298, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Fairmont Mayakoba
address: Carretera Federal Cancun - Playa Del Carmen Km 298, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: With the Caribbean Sea on one side and 240 acres of tropical forest and sparkling lagoons on all others, Fairmont Mayakoba is a hidden paradise on the coast of Mexico. Our private gated resort invites you to reconnect with nature, while enjoying all the services and facilities of an AAA Five Diamond hotel. Delve into your lush surroundings, play in the waves at nearby Playa del Carmen or relax poolside at our 5-star Riviera Maya hotel. Then dine on a decadent variety of cuisines in our restaurants.accorhotels.com

name: Fairmont Heritage Place Mayakoba
address: Carretera Federal Cun Playa, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Fairmont Heritage Place Mayakoba consists of ultra luxurious, fully furnished 3 and 4 bedroom residences provided with the unmatched service and amenities of Fairmont Mayakoba, containing a host of leisure and retail facilities to which Owners will have access. The Fairmont Heritage Place Mayakoba community is set aside from the hotel, granting additional privacy and exclusivity to its owners.accorhotels.com

name: Andaz Mayakoba - a concept by Hyatt
address: Carretera Federal Cancun-Playa Del Carmen Km. 298, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Offering two outdoor pools and a private beach area, Upscale Andaz Mayakoba is in the gated Mayakoba complex in Playa del Carmen. The resort has a spa centre and sauna, and guests can enjoy a meal at one of the 4 restaurants. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property and free private parking is available on this pet friendly property. Every room at this resort is air conditioned and comes with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Some units have a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Certain units include views of the sea or lake. Rooms include a private bathroom. Extras include bathrobes and slippers. The restaurant offer cover fine dinning with Casa Amate, fresh and local ingredients with relaxed environment with Cocina Milagro, and beachfront street and sea food at Sotavento and Tinta del Pulpo. Room service is also available 24 hours. This elegant resort offers a Mayan Oasis Spa with 6 massage rooms and a hydrotherapy circuit centre and sauna and access to El Camaleón Golf Club and the Mayakoba Tennis Centre. This resort has water sports facilities and free use of bicycles is available. You can engage in various activities, such as golfing and snorkelling. Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal is 9 km from Andaz Mayakoba, while Church of Guadalupe is 6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cancun International Airport, 40 km from Andaz Mayakoba - a concept by Hyatt. This hotel only accepts credit cards, debit cards and, where applicable, other contactless forms of payment. It is a cash-free environment

name: Palmaia, The House of AiA
address: Paseo Xaman Ha, Lt.1, Playacar, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Strategically situated at the tail end of the most beautiful beach in the Riviera Maya, The House of AïA brings us Palmaïa, an exclusive beach enclave focused on connecting us to nature, ourselves, and the sanctity of life. Every effort was taken to ensure the original landscape remains untouched to feel the healing authenticity of old-growth trees and naturally occurring, cool-water cenotes. All guests reside in ocean-front suites: some with swim-out access to the infinity pools, others with sweeping views of the sea, and a few nestled among the ocean-side mangroves. Guests also enjoy high-end amenities without sacrificing environmentally friendly practices, while the restaurants offer the best cuisine in the region, extensive plant-based options, and impeccable style. But even still, the real jewels are the Architects of Life personal growth program and the Rituals of Sound series. The Hotel is Pet Friendly, for more information contact the hotel.FarePortal

name: Grand Hyatt Playa Del Carmen Resort
address: 1a Avenida Esquina Calle 26, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Offering 3 ocean-front outdoor pools and a spa and wellness centre with spectacular architecture resembling a Cenote, Grand Hyatt Playa del Carmen Resort is located in Mamita’s Beach. The design concept has crafted natural elements, artwork, textures and light. The rooms will provide you with a TV, air conditioning, iPod dock and seating area. Complete with a coffee machine, the dining area also has a dining table. Featuring a bath or shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer. Extras include free WiFi in all rooms and floor-to-ceiling windows featuring amazing views. At Grand Hyatt Playa del Carmen Resort you will find 2 restaurants serving steak specialties and international cuisine, 3 bars and a fitness centre. Unique food and beverage concepts and signature offerings from our restaurants and bars, such as Sushi "n" Raw Seafood Bar and La Cocina, will set the stage for you to enjoy the local flavors of Grand Hyatt Playa del Carmen Resort. Room Service available 24 hours. Other facilities offered at the property include water sports facilities, meeting facilities, Beauty Salon and a games room. There is also a multi-purpose ballroom plus fifteen meeting rooms and various indoor and outdoor pre-function areas for events. If you feel like visiting the surroundings, check out the famous shopping, gastronomic and party scenes at La Quinta Avenida. This resort is 55.5 km from Cancún International Airporttional Airport.

name: Tukan Hotel & Beach Club
address: 5a Ave Norte Entre 14 Y 16, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Fairmont Mayakoba, Riviera Maya
address: Ctr. Federal Cancun - Playa Del Carmen KM. 298, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Located in Playa del Carmen, this beachfront property is in the entertainment district, 0.3 mi (0.5 km) from El Camaleon Mayakoba Golf Course, and 2.7 mi (4.3 km) from Tres Rios Ecopark. Mamitas Beach Club and Playa del Carmen Main Beach are also within 6 mi (10 km).Expedia

name: La Casa de la Playa by Xcaret- All Fun Adults Only
address: Carr. Chetumal-Puerto Juarez KM 282, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: General description: The hotel La Casa de la Playa is located in the vicinity of a sandy/rocky beach. The town Playa del Carmen is around 8 km away (Tulum around 50 km, Cancún around 60 km). The following attractions can be reached from the hotel: Xplor (approx. 1 km away) and Xenses (approx. 1 km away). For mobility there is a taxi rank and a car rental company. The airport (CUN) is approx. 55 km away. The hotel and airport are linked by a free shuttle. There is also a shuttle to Parks Group Xcaret (for free). Amenities: The 3-storey beach hotel has 63 rooms in total. It is equipped with a reception (check-in from 15:00, check-out until 12:00), a lobby with bar, a lift, an air conditioning, a safe (for free), a shop as well as a parking area (for free). For the meals, there are 4 restaurants (air-conditioned). You will be warmly welcomed in both the hotel’s bars. Room service and concierge service are free of charge. Laundry / ironing service and medical service are available for a fee. Pool: In the outdoor area of the hotel you will find 3 fresh water pools. Here, there are sun umbrellas for free available. At the pool bar you can get refreshing beverages. Meals: Breakfast a la carte. Sport and Leisure: Sports and entertainment: Fitness and aerobics. Bicycle rental. Spa area, sauna, whirlpool and massages available for a fee. Additional information: Additional fees may apply for certain facilities, amenities or activities. Some services depend on the local climatic conditions and the season. Languages spoken: English and Spanish. Accepted methods of payment: Visa, American Express and Euro / MasterCard. Some services and facilities might be closed or offered with restrictions due to COVID19 Prevention measurement. Changes can be applied without previous notice.Ticket Package

name: Dreams Puerto Aventuras Resort & Spa
address: Km 269.5 Carretera Chetumal, 77750 Puerto Aventuras, Quintana Roo
description: Set on Quintana Beach and featuring a spa and outdoor pool, Dreams Aventuras Riviera Maya Resort has luxurious rooms overlooking its gardens, or the sea. It has 6 restaurants and a diving centre. The spacious, air-conditioned rooms at the Puerto Aventuras Resort & Spa come with a balcony. Each has subtle, Mexican-style décor with tiled floors. All feature a flat-screen TV and minibar. A range of cuisine including Italian, Mexican and grilled seafood, is on offer in the Aventuras’ restaurants. There is also an international buffet and a beach bar. Guests can relax on the charming terrace, which features thatched palapa shelters. The on-site spa has a range of hot tubs, plunge pools and steam baths. Treatments on offer include reflexology, aromatherapy and wraps. The resort is a 20-minute drive from the Mayan ruins at Tulum. The popular resort of Playa del Carmen is less than 20 km away. Family friendly hotel, please see fine print for additional information.

name: Hard Rock Hotel Riviera Maya
address: Km 72, Carretera Cancun-Chetumal, 77701 Puerto Aventuras, Quintana Roo
description: Bordered by a private white sand beach and lush tropical landscapes, this decadent luxury resort pulls out all the stops for an unreal holiday for families and couples alike. The resort is situated near Playa del Carmen on the Mayan Riviera, less than 50 kilometres from the pre-Colombian Mayan ruins of Tulum. Visitors will have many opportunities to explore the area with excursions to Tulum and Chichen-Itza archaeological sites, and can swim with dolphins or even tour the Hard Rock sister hotel in Cancun. Each room offers generous proportions, a hydro spa bathtub, private balcony, and a range of state-of-the-art amenities, all decorated with vibrant colours and textures. Guests will delight in the private beach, children's pool and family pool, and the resort also offers a sophisticated and opulent adults-only hotel with four pools, nine imaginative restaurants and six lavish bars exclusively for adults. generalViajes Exito Hotels

name: Blue Diamond Luxury Boutique Hotel Adults Only
address: Km. 298.8 Carretera #307, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: "Blue Diamond Luxury Boutique has 4 Diamond Award Resort, is set in tropical gardens in the Riviera Maya. It offers attractive Suites, a spa, 3 outdoor pools, golf course nearby. Blue Diamond Luxury Boutique suites have a terrace or garden, some with private pool, and include views of the Caribbean Sea, cenotes or lagoons. All have a plasma TV, CD and DVD player and a rain shower. The hotel offers a wide variety of food options. There are 3 restaurants and a tapas bar, as well as a lounge bar, cafeteria and poolside snack bar. Also room service is available with extra charge. The resort has a gym, while the spa provides beauty therapies. Other activities include yoga, pilates and watsu. There is also a boutique and a beauty salon. Cancun International Airport is 35 minutes’ drive from the Blue Diamond Luxury Boutique."

name: Hacienda del Mar Los Cabos
address: Corredor Turístico Sjc-Csl, KM. 10 Lote D, Cabo Del Sol, 23455 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Experience the beauty and charm of Hacienda del Mar Los Cabos Resort, a stunning architectural masterpiece with a classic Mexican Hacienda flair. Elegant guest villas with balconies are scattered across lush, tropical gardens overlooking a private beach on the Emerald Sea of Cortez. Enjoy a seamless blend of traditional Mexican charm and contemporary style with exceptional service unlike anywhere else. Situated in the prestigious Cabo del Sol development, the resort features 270 guest rooms and suites, the restorative Cactus SPA™, a fitness center with a steam room and sauna, a variety of restaurants to choose from, evening entertainment, and sparkling pools that create an atmosphere of pure indulgence. For timeless celebrations, our planners can assist in an unforgettable beach wedding or ballroom gathering, curated in every way.Marriott

name: Waldorf Astoria Los Cabos Pedregal
address: Camino Del Mar 1, 23455 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Welcome to Waldorf Astoria Los Cabos Pedregal, where desert beauty meets the deep blue sea. Boasting a cliffside location along 24 acres of dramatic mountains and pristine beaches, enter paradise through the private Dos Mares tunnel and begin your exclusive experience in unprecedented luxury. Every resort guest room is spacious and refined, stocked with the soothing amenities our guests expect, and includes a private plunge pool to calm and center you. Opt for a suite to enjoy butler service. Other luxuries for your stay: - Award-winning Forbes five-star signature spa offering 10 private treatment rooms - 3 pools, including infinity pool overlooking the Pacific, saltwater pool, and kids pool - Culinary offerings including signature restaurant Don Manuel's and cliffside El Farallon - Curated, luxury experience highlighting the Baja Peninsula's land, wildlife, and people - Traditional indoor and unique outdoor oceanfront event space Our Waldorf Astoria resort is close to Los Cabos International Airport, and shuttle service is provided.Hilton

name: Esperanza, Auberge Resorts Collection
address: Carretera Transpeninsular Km 7, 23410 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Situated on the coast of the Pacific Ocean, this luxury resort is 19 km from downtown Los Cabos. It features a beachfront infinity pool, spa boutique, and free yoga sessions. Each spacious cabana-style room at the Cabo San Lucas Esperanza Resort is furnished with high ceilings and a large, private terrace. Guests can watch the flat-screen TV, use the free Wi-Fi, or charge their iPod with the iPod docking station. This resort boasts a private beach with concierge services. There is a large state-of-the-art gym and an on-site art gallery. Cocina del Mar, part of the resort, is carved into the cliffs overlooking the ocean and serves Baja-inspired cuisine. La Terraza Americana is open for lunch and offers American dishes in a casual outdoor atmosphere. The infinity pool has a swim-up bar. Cabo San Lucas International Airport is 14.2 km from Esperanza Resort Cabo San Lucas. Downtown San José del Cabo is a 25-minute drive from the property.

name: Montage Los Cabos
address: Carretera Transpeninsular Km 12.5 Int, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Situated in Cabo San Lucas, 2.6 km from Medano Beach, Montage Los Cabos features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. The accommodation offers a range of water sports facilities and a private beach area, as well as a terrace and a bar. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. Certain rooms have a kitchen with a fridge, a dishwasher and an oven. A continental, American or vegetarian breakfast is available each morning at the property. At the hotel you will find a restaurant serving Mexican cuisine. Dairy-free, kosher and vegan options can also be requested. Montage Los Cabos offers a hot tub. You can play table tennis and tennis at this 5-star hotel, and the area is popular for hiking and snorkelling. Cabo San Lucas Country Club is 2.3 km from the accommodation, while Marina Cabo San Lucas is 3.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Los Cabos International Airport, 42 km from Montage Los Cabos.

name: Live Aqua Private Residences Los Cabos
address: Carr. Transpeninsular Km 10.3, 23410 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Discover a luxurious paradise nestled within the exclusive oceanfront community of Cabo del Sol. Overlooking the marvelous deep blue waters of the Sea of Corts, the fifth fairway of The Ocean Golf Course designed by Jack Nicklaus and the magnificent beauty of the Baja California Desert, these 35 stunning vacation residences are custom designed with high-end interior and exterior finishes to offer an experience that will likely instill a yearning to return year after year. Live Aqua Private Residence Los Cabos unveiled its multimillion-dollar concept in Fall 2017 to overindulge the senses. Fine dining, a relaxing pool atmosphere, premier beach access, exceptional personalized service and world-class golf just 5 minutes away will surely become the new standard for your family getaways.Please be advised that from now on, an official Sanitation tax of 36.31 MXN per night will be charged in our hotels located in Los Cabos, Baja California Sur.iHotelier/iStay

name: Corazón Cabo, a Noble House Resort
address: Callejon Pescador South N, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: This Cabo San Lucas hotel is located along Cabo Bay on Medano Beach. The hotel offers a full-service spa, on-site dining options and guest suites with ocean views, subject to availability. Corazón Cabo, a Noble House Resort features 2 outdoor pools, including one that is for adults only. A modern fitness centre free of charge is also available on-site. The property features a state of the art wireless connection system that allows to have high-speed WiFi and unlimited services like messages, phone calls and a virtual phone number connection. Guest rooms at the Cabo Villas Beach are equipped with flat-screen TVs and coffee makers. Microwaves and mini-refrigerators are also included. Guests can dine at the Baja Brewing Rooftop Restaurant, Aleta Seafood Bar & Grillt or at the Beach Club.

name: One&Only Palmilla
address: Km 7.5 Carretera Transpeninsular, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: This oceanfront hotel features spa treatments in 13 private villas. A 27-hole golf course and rooms with views of the Pacific Ocean or the Sea of Cortez are available. Guest rooms and suites at the One&Only Palmilla boast Mexican designs. Each includes a patio or a balcony. They are equipped with a flat-screen TV and iPod docking station. This hotel ranked among the top 100 Hotels & Resorts in the World. Dining options at Palmilla One&Only include ‘Mexiterranean’ and Euro Asian cuisines along with fresh sushi. Tequila tastings are also available at Agua and the resort features over 1,500 international wines. Guests can relax in the 2 outdoor pools or play a game of tennis. One&Only Palmilla in San Jose Del Cabo offers private beach access and a state-of-the-art gym. Scuba diving, deep-sea fishing and shopping are minutes from the One&Only Palmilla. Cabo San Lucas is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Vidasoul
address: 1000 Camino Cabo Este, 23440 La Fortuna, Baja California Sur
description: Vidasoul is a luxurious, modern resort located along the beautiful shores of the Gulf of California in Boca de las Vinorama. It features a private beach area, pool and beach club area with poolside service and swim up bar. Each tastefully decorated room at this property comes with sea views, a premium mattress, free wi-fi a flat-screen TV and a small seating area. The bathrooms feature a rain-forest shower, while the deluxe rooms boast a bath tub. Gourmet international and national cuisine is served at Vidasoul’s restaurant, and guests can order food and drinks while relaxing at the beach. The resort offers a range of on-site activities, including water sports, mountain biking, horse riding and kayak rental. San Jose del Cabo, where guests will find shopping and nightlife, is a 1-hour drive away. Cabo Pulmo Reef is 30 km from the property, while Los Cabos International Airport can be reached within an 1 hour drive of Vidasoul.

name: Zadun-A Ritz-Carlton Reserve
address: Boulevard Mar de Cortez, 23403 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Welcome to Zadún, the first Ritz-Carlton Reserve in Mexico where an authentic and magical experience awaits you. Our resort in San José del Cabo offers an untouched sanctum where desert and ocean collide — in your very own luxurious haven. Allow yourself to be seduced by Puerto Los Cabos, its breathtaking coastline, and a rich culture that will enchant you at every breath. Discover and explore a town with a historical charm and submerged in Spanish colonial flare. A very modern design Mexico has to offer, coupled with the handcrafted work of local artisans, will lay a magical and compelling experience at your feet. With every step you take inside Zadún, you’ll be surrounded by a natural allure and elegance unlike anything you’ve ever seen. Give in to the intimacy of our San José del Cabo hotel hideaway that you can claim as your own, reserved just for you at the end of the Earth.Marriott

name: Viceroy Los Cabos
address: Paseo Malecón Sjc, Lote 8, Zona Hotelera, 23405 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: No description found

name: Solaz, A Luxury Collection Resort, Los Cabos
address: Km 18 5 Carretera Transpeninsular Csl-sj, 23405 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Covet is our prime location on the beach at Solaz, a Luxury Collection Resort, Los Cabos. Enjoy easy access from our luxury hotel to the Baja peninsula, downtown San Jose del Cabo and Marina Cabo San Lucas. Our contemporary luxury hotel in San Jose, Los Cabos features rooms and suites with an ideal respite and exquisite designs, luxury beds, marble floors and custom furnishings. Our resort's custom floor plans blur the line between indoor and outdoor spaces. Many rooms boast private entrances with secluded, furnished patios, outdoor showers, private plunge pools and unobstructed views of the beach and Sea of Cortez. Pamper yourself in San Jose del Cabo at our hotel spa after you sample our resort's diverse dining options. Stay fit in our 24-hour fitness center with help from a personal trainer. Then relax in one of two heated infinity pools while the kids enjoy our two heated children's pools. A truly blissful experience awaits you at Solaz.Marriott

name: Hotel Palmas De Cortez
address: Calle 20 de Noviembre # 2, 23330 Los Barriles, Baja California Sur
description: Offering spa service, a gym, swimming pool, on-site windsurfing and tennis courts, Hotel Palmas de Cortez is located right on Los Barriles Beach. Buena Vista Beach is less than 4 km away. The accommodation offers contemporary décor, air conditioning, ceiling fan, telephone and TV. The private bathrooms feature shower and include free toiletries. This complex features a restaurant serving international food and Mexican-style cuisine. There are also a swim-up bar, a pool-side bar and a lounge bar on site. Guests at Hotel Palmas de Cortez can arrange activities as eco-tours, fishing, kayaking, paddle boards and ATV rentals. There is also a playground area, children’s pool and tennis court. Events facilities as conference rooms, meeting rooms, exhibit spaces and banquets facilities are also available as well shuttle services with an extra charge. This property is 500 metres from the ExotiKite Kiteboarding School. Santiago Zoo is 23 km away and Los Cabos International Airport is a 50-minute drive away.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites by Hilton Los Cabos
address: Carretera Transpeninsular Km. 24.8, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Hampton Inn & Suites by Hilton Los Cabos is conveniently located between San Jose Del Cabo and Cabo San Lucas, offering easy access to all of the area attractions. This intimate hotel is a great choice for being close to scenic beaches, award-winning golf courses, fishing, surfing plus great shopping and nightlife. Located near the new tollway, our Los Cabos hotel also offers easy access to the airport. Settle into your spacious guest room or suite and enjoy free hot breakfast buffet daily from 6:00am to 10:00am. Each room includes a clean and fresh Hampton bed™, free WiFi and refrigerator. Many rooms feature kitchenettes and sofa sleepers, perfect for families. Pamper yourself in the bathroom with a Waterpik® showerhead and Purity Basics® bath products. Enjoy extra space and amenities in our deluxe rooms with great views and authentic décor. Our Los Cabos hotel is part of the Koral Center that features new ABC hospital, restaurants, shops and more all within one roof for your convenience. Inside the hotel visit our Wellness Center and Spa, unwind in the rooftop pool or whirlpool, and try some intricate cocktail creations in the rooftop Palapa Bar while admiring views of the ocean and mountains. Hampton by Hilton Las Cabos offers a pristine location for banquets and weddings with 1,500 sq. ft. of meeting space accommodating up to 60 guests. Our friendly staff looks forward to welcoming you with all of the world class service and hospitality.Hilton

name: Fairfield by Marriott Los Cabos
address: Avenida Lazaro Cardenas 2709, 23410 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Located along Lazaro Cardenas, the pulse of Cabo San Lucas, Fairfield Inn Los Cabos is a charming retreat situated moments from destinations such as Medano Beach, Puerto Paraíso Entertainment Plaza and the Arch of Cabo San Lucas. Modern amenities and comfortable rooms offer an unrivaled stay at our Los Cabos hotel. Before spurring fun in the sun, get a good night's rest in our well-appointed hotel rooms. With free high-speed Wi-Fi, ergonomic workstations and plush bedding, you have everything you need to feel at home. In the morning, fuel up with our complimentary hot breakfast buffet featuring a variety of hearty favorites. Before turning into a beach bum, head to our fitness center and work up a sweat with cardio machines and free weights. Our outdoor pool is the perfect place to unwind while soaking up the bright Mexico sunshine. At Fairfield Inn Los Cabos, you're our #1 priority. Ask us about the Fairfield 100% Guarantee™, where we promise you'll be satisfied or we'll make it right.Marriott

name: The Club at Solaz
address: Corredor Turístico Csl-Sjc Km. 18.5, 23405 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Magnificent beach front resort located on the Tourist Corridor between the golden of the Baja California desert and the turquoise waters of the Sea of Cortez. Designed by Sordo Madaleno Architects to create a sculpture integrated to the landscape with ocean views from all areas of the resort.A nature-inspired refuge that is meant to bring balance, harmony and freedom to those who step inside and combines Mexican contemporary style with modern sophistication and exclusivity, that provides luxury and comfort of modernity merging in perfect tune with nature.Quarry stone, granite, marble, wood, and textures harmonize to establish an intimate bond between the complex and its location.Landscaped by Jernimo Gabayet; the selection consists of a mixture of trees, bushes and flowers of endemic and exotic origin. Together paint a grandiose atmosphere full of life and color, providing the surroundings with the natural beauty that can only come from the earth and keep our guests in touch with the Baja California Surs unique wonders.Immaculate and refined art from the renowned Mexican artist Csar Lpez Negrete, whos challenge was to make our guests to be able to remember Solaz Los Cabos through its art collection that consists of 772 pieces displayed throughout the property and longing to return time after time.iHotelier/iStay

name: Four Seasons Resort Los Cabos at Costa Palmas
address: Calle Hacienda Eureka, 23570 La Ribera, Baja California Sur
description: Set within the thousand-acre private resort community of Costa Palmas along the secluded East Cape of Mexico’s Baja Sur, the Four Seasons Resort Los Cabos at Costa Palmas™ is a haven of exquisite beauty and serenity. From its two-mile stretch of pristine beach and swimmable waters, to its sublime location—just 45 minutes from Los Cabos International Airport, yet far from the crowded Cabo resorts—this idyllic retreat makes for an ideal tropical luxury getaway. The Resort offers many open-air public spaces including the lobby and nearly all dining venues; its low-lying architectural footprint precludes the need for shared elevators or hallways. Natural light permeates the guest rooms and suites, which are designed by Todd-Avery Lenahan of TAL Studio. All accommodations showcase striking views of the Sea of Cortez as well as spacious private terraces; first-floor guest rooms and suites also boast private plunge pools. Choose from several exceptional dining options: Estiatorio Milos, Chef Costas Spiliadis’s famed Mediterranean seafood restaurant featuring a market-style menu of impeccable seafood; Casa de Brasa, a Baja-inspired brasserie; El Puesto, serving sea-to-table ceviche, tiraditos, and crudo; Limón, an all fresco bar and grill; and Ginger’s, an all-day eclectic café. Indulge in the Resort’s array of refined on-site amenities, including Costa Palmas Golf Club, a Robert Trent Jones II eighteen-hole golf course, a leading-edge sports and fitness facility designed by world-renowned fitness expert Harley Pasternak, six refreshing swimming pools, and a blissful Oasis spa, and wellness center featuring ten free-standing treatment sanctuaries. Let the Resort’s Adventure Concierge help you unlock the East Cape—Mexico’s best-kept secret—by arranging any number of exhilarating land and sea activities: hiking to hidden waterfalls, swimming alongside the majestic whale shark, surfing in legendary waters, snorkeling in the nearby UNESCO World Heritage site of Cabo Pulmo, sport fishing in the Sea of Cortez, off-roading through desert dunes, sailing from the Resort’s marina, horseback riding amid vibrant natural beauty, and more.

name: Buena Vista Oceanfront & Hot Springs Resort
address: Carr. Federal #1 km 105, 23580 Buenavista, Baja California Sur
description: Nestled on Mexico's Baja Peninsula, facing the Sea of Cortez, this hotel in Buena Vista offers access to a variety of activities, relaxing guestrooms and enjoyable facilities. Hotel Buena Vista Beach Resort features Mediterranean-style guestrooms with private patios furnished with hammocks. Guests can go for a swim in the outdoor pool, then relax with a massage or pedicure. El Navegante restaurant at the Buena Vista Resort serves traditional Mexican cuisine for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Guests can order nachos while soaking up the sun beside the pool, or sip a refreshing drink from the pool's swim-up bar. After dinner, guests can relax with a drink in El Pescador Bar. Activities such as fishing, scuba diving and horseback riding are available just minutes from the Buena Vista Beach Hotel. Guests can also explore the 30 miles of beach, or play a game of tennis.

name: Zoetry Casa del Mar Los Cabos
address: Carretera Transpeninsular KM 19.5, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Experience our most luxurious suite—measuring 2,908 square feet and showcasing a large sea-view terrace or balcony with infinity-edge plunge pool, a full kitchen with top-rated appliances, expansive living spaces with a sofa bed and entertainment center, two full bathrooms with rain showers and walk-in closets, a dining area with seating for eight, a king bedroom, plus a bedroom with two queen beds.VRBO

name: Hilton Los Cabos
address: Carretera Transpeninsular, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Iconic yet innovative, classic yet contemporary, Hilton Los Cabos embodies the evolution of the sophisticated resort experience in Cabo San Lucas. Steps away from the Sea of Cortez in the exclusive Los Cabos corridor, along one of the only swimmable beaches in the region, Hilton Los Cabos offers lush, rich surroundings, anticipatory service, and the perfect blend of relaxation and rejuvenation. With expansive views from oceanfront rooms and suites, some featuring private plunge pools, this is a place for guests to discover authentic Mexico, where elevated dining and wellness options are all flavored with local cultural experiences and an international flair. Here, nothing is scripted: From family fun at the Enclave Beach Club to romantic respites in a seaside cabana, energetic events in our gathering spaces to the prime guestrooms and upgraded amenities of AltaMar, you are free to craft your own signature story.Hilton

name: The Cape, a Thompson Hotel
address: Carretera Tranpeninsular Km 5, 23455 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Location The Cape - A Thompson Hotel is a beachfront retreat located in Cabo San Lucas offering views over the El Arco and the Bahia San Lucas horizon. Todos Santos is about an hour drive away and Cabo San Lucas International Airport is approximately 12 km from the property. Rooms Accommodations are decorated with bespoke mid-century Latin American furnishings and features a private balcony with hanging daybed overlooking the ocean and El Arco. Each room is equipped with a craft cocktail bar and a gourmet mini bar, complimentary WiFi access, in-room safe and a state-of-the-art rain shower and luxurious cotton kimono robes. Some of the rooms have private plunge pools and butler service. Property Features The restaurant and bars on site offers al fresco and indoor dining featuring local and international dishes. For recreation, the hotel features an outdoor infinity pool and bar, salt water pool, hot tub, fitness gym and a spa with hot and cold plunge pools, steam room, sauna and couples treatment room with rain showers and a private pool. Other facilities and services include meeting rooms, free WiFi access and transportation services available upon request through the concierge desk.WebBeds

name: Chileno Bay Resort & Residences, Auberge Resorts Collection
address: Carretera Transpeninsular Km 15, 23410 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Situated in Cabo San Lucas, a few steps from El Chileno Beach, Chileno Bay Resort & Residences, Auberge Resorts Collection features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a shared lounge and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service for guests. Some rooms also boast a kitchen with a minibar. The hotel offers 5-star accommodation with a sauna and terrace. You can play table tennis at Chileno Bay Resort & Residences, Auberge Resorts Collection. Boca del Tule Beach is 1.8 km from the accommodation, while Cabo Real Golf Course is 6.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Los Cabos International Airport, 28 km from Chileno Bay Resort & Residences, Auberge Resorts Collection.

name: Nobu Hotel Los Cabos
address: Polígono 1, Fracción D, Fraccionamiento Diamante, 23473 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Located in Cabo San Lucas, 11 km from Marina Cabo San Lucas, Nobu Hotel Los Cabos provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Providing a restaurant, the property also has a bar, as well as a sauna and a hot tub. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a kids' club and free WiFi. Each room is equipped with air conditioning, and certain rooms at the resort have a balcony. À la carte and continental breakfast options are available daily at Nobu Hotel Los Cabos. The accommodation offers a sun terrace. Guests can enjoy playing table tennis, or take advantage of the business centre. El Arco is 12 km from Nobu Hotel Los Cabos, while Cabo San Lucas Country Club is 14 km away. The nearest airport is Los Cabos International Airport, 56 km from the resort.

name: Hotel El Ganzo Adults Only
address: Blvd Tiburon, 23403 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: All 70 guestrooms overlooking the Sea of Cortez are luxuriously appointed with modern, refined dcor with rustic undertones brought in with natural materials and woods throughout. A complimentary, fully stocked minibar, custom, artisan bath amenities, and wireless internet access are among the amenities.iHotelier/iStay

name: Medano Hotel and Spa
address: Camino Real esq. Paseo del Pescador, 23453 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: No description found

name: Bahia Hotel & Beach House
address: Av. El Pescador, 23410 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Just steps from one of the finest beaches in Cabo San Lucas, guests will find a peaceful escape with exceptional service. Free WiFi is available at the front desk and the pool bar. While relaxing in the peaceful outdoor pool, guests can swim to the bar for an ice-cold beverage. Guests will also enjoy the fine dining at the on-site restaurant. Bahia Hotel is minutes from the vibrant nightlife of Cabo San Lucas city centre. The area provides some of the best fishing and boating opportunities.

name: Secrets Puerto Los Cabos Adults Only
address: Puerto Los Cabos, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Set in the exclusive community of Puerto Los Cabos, Secrets Puerto Los Cabos Golf & Spa Resort offers adults a stunning Unlimited-Luxury® getaway in Mexico's Baja California Peninsula. The secure community around Secrets Puerto Los Cabos provides striking views of native flora and fauna and miles of unspoiled beachfront of the Sea of Cortez. The resort boasts 500 spacious non-smoking suites each with a private balcony or terrace, 24-hour room service, daily refreshed mini-bar, a Secrets Box for private in-suite dining and more. For added luxury, 150 ocean view suites are reserved for Preferred Club with access to additional privileges including a private lounge, upgraded amenities and mini-bar service, pillow menu, outdoor whirlpool and other extras. Unlimited-Luxury® continues throughout the resort where guests are treated to limitless gourmet fare and top-shelf spirits at elegant restaurants, bars and lounges. 24-hour dining options allow guests to enjoy late night bites at Coco Café. Or stay in and order room service. It's all available at any hour day or night. Indulge in the over 12,000 sq. ft. Secrets Spa by Pevonia and be treated to spa options in 21 treatment rooms, a full-service beauty salon or an extensive hydrotherapy circuit. Follow up this rejuvenation at the fully equipped fitness center or by taking part in one of many daily and nightly activities. Choose from a variety of beach, land and water activities, take a dip in one of two main heated pools, go on a leisurely walk along the 3 mile stretch of unspoiled Pacific Coast beach or catch the live nightly entertainment. Plus, the Puerto Los Cabos community provides, just steps away, a full service Marina with world-class sport fishing and artisan walkway, and the only composite 18-hole golf course in the area designed by Jack Nicklaus and Greg Norman.FarePortal

name: Casa Natalia Boutique Hotel Adults Only
address: Boulevard Mijares 4, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Come and enjoy the beauty, luxury and romance in one of the top 10 hotels in Mexico, as voted by Cond Nast Traveller readers. Casa Natalia is a charming boutique hotel which features 18 luxury suites decorated with unique local Mexican art, private outdoor terraces and hammocks.Located in the heart of San Jose del Cabo's Centro Historico, Casa Natalia is surrounded by quaint cobblestone streets, charming Spanish-inspired colonial buildings, family-owned jewelry shops, inviting restaurants and, of course, the natural beauty of Baja.Casa Natalia is home to the delicious internationally-inspired Mi Cocina Restaurant and Baja Oyster Bar.iHotelier/iStay

name: Alegranza Luxury Resort - All Master Suite
address: Paseo De Las Misiones, 927, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Alegranza Luxury Resort All Master Suite gated community is located in the San Jose del Cabo's Golf Course. Features include a sauna, golf practice facility, and 3 shared heated pools with 2 hot tubs. Each suite and apartment has a fully equipped kitchen, balcony, and flat-screen television. Select apartments have a hot tub on a rooftop terrace. Restaurant Raices and Restaurant Miraiis are available on site with one of the best chefs in town for breakfast, lunch or dinner. This San José del Cabo Alegranza Luxury Resort also offers the Palapa Bar with outdoor barbecue facilities. A tennis court and underground parking are available. Tour information is offered as well. Guests are a 15 minutes' drive from the Los Cabos International Airport. The property is 1.4 km from San Jose Estuary, 2.1 km from Club Campestre, and 44.8 km from Cabo Pulmo National Park.

name: Sandoval Ocean Front Penthouse at Corazon Resort
address: Camino Viejo a San Jose, 23454 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: No description found

name: Villa del Faro
address: 65 Km Camino Costero, 23400 La Fortuna, Baja California Sur
description: Villa del Faro offers an outdoor pool and terraces with spectacular views of the Cortez Sea. This eco-friendly property is located on the beachfront, 3 km north of Boca de la Vinorama. The solar-powered accommodations boast unique handmade furniture and a fireplace. All the accommodations have patios and terraces offering stunning views and outdoor furniture. The private bathrooms provide free toiletries. Facing the Cortez Sea, Villa del Faro’s small restaurant opens exclusively for guests and serves Mexican cuisine that varies every day. Breakfast is included daily and dinners can be arranged on request. There is also a full bar with an extensive wine list. Villa del Faro has its own secluded beach area. Guests have the opportunity to enjoy activities such as sport fishing, surfing, kayaking, hiking and horse riding on the beach. Whale-watching trips can be arranged in season. Cabo Pulmo National Park is just a 30-minute drive away, while Los Cabos International Airport can be reached in about 1 hour by car. Access is via a rough dirt road.

name: La Concha Beach Hotel & Club
address: Km 5 Carretera A Pichilingue, 23010 La Paz, Baja California Sur
description: La Concha Beach Hotel & Club has a beach club that offers snorkelling, diving and canoeing tours. It has a private beach in La Concha, outdoor pool, and massage services. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. The elegant rooms have air conditioning, cable TV, and offer sea views. The bathroom is private and has free toiletries. The hotel has an on-site restaurant that serves Mexican and international-style dishes. The pool bar operates from 9:00 to 22:30 hours. The hotel also has vending machines with snacks and drinks. La Concha Beach Hotel & Club’s facilities include meeting rooms, a fitness centre and a business centre. Money exchange is available, as well as free shuttle services to central La Paz. La Paz International Airport is 25 minutes’ drive from La Concha Beach Resort, and after an 8-minute drive guests will find the restaurant and bar zone downtown. The bus station can be reached within a 10-minute ride.

name: Hyatt Place La Paz
address: Km. 7.5 Carretera a Pichilingue, 23010 La Paz, Baja California Sur
description: Hyatt Place La Paz is located 10 minutes’ drive from central La Paz, Baja California Sur. The hotel is modern and offers an outdoor pool, restaurant and bar. Free WiFi is also available. The elegant and moderns rooms include a seating area, air conditioning and cable TV. There is a dining area equipped with a microwave, fridge and coffee machine. The bathrooms all have a hairdryer. The property offers the Hyatt Grand Bed, a unique concept of Hyatt Place. At Hyatt Place La Paz guests will enjoy of a fitness centre. Other facilities offered at the property include meeting facilities, a tour desk and luggage storage. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including golfing, sports fishing and diving. Set right across the Marina Puerta Cortes, the hotel enables guests access to play golf in the exclusive Golf Course in the exclusive El Cortes Gary Player Signature Golf Course.

name: Costa Baja Resort & Spa
address: Carretera a Pichilingue Km 7.5, 23010 La Paz, Baja California Sur
description: Discover the captivating oasis of Hotel Indigo Costa Baja Resort & Spa, where the desert meets the sea. Nestled between the Sea of Cortez and La Paz Bay, our beachfront resort in La Paz, Mexico, offers unparalleled service and breathtaking views perfect for vacations and destination weddings in the Baja. Embark on a journey of wellness at Espíritu Spa. Relax on our white-sand beach and take a swim in our infinity pool. Tee off at the El Cortés Golf Club. Enjoy bold Mexican and international flavors at our restaurants, Cardon and Barco. Indulge in beautifully designed rooms with garden and pool views. Discover the essence of La Paz along the Malecón or enjoy water sports at the marina. The perfect blend of serenity and adventure.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hotel Hacienda Bugambilias
address: Aquiles Serdán And Vicente Guerrero 520, La Paz, Baja California Sur
description: Only 5 minutes’ drive from central La Paz, Hotel Hacienda Bugambilias features outdoor swimming pool, free Wi-Fi and garden views. La Paz walking pier is just 200 metres from the hotel. The simply decorated rooms have wooden furniture and hand-painted tiles in the bathroom. The rooms also feature a working desk, satellite TV and wake-up service. The bathrooms are private and offer free toiletries. The on-site restaurant serves traditional local dishes and seafood. And within a 1.2 km radius, guests will be able to find restaurants and other food options. The Historic Centre and the cathedral are 5 minutes’ walk from Hacienda Bugambilias, and La Paz International Airport is 13 km away. The hotel may help guests with the organization of different tours, such as whalewatching and city tours.

name: Leo's Baja Oasis
address: Ignacio Allende 440, 23000 La Paz, Baja California Sur
description: Boasting pool with a view, garden and views of mountain, Leo's Baja Oasis is located in La Paz, 1.5 km from La Paz Malecon Beach. Featuring full-day security, this property also provides guests with a water park. Guests can make use of the sun terrace or the outdoor fireplace, or enjoy views of the pool and garden. Guest rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a microwave, a coffee machine, a walk-in shower, a hair dryer and a outdoor furniture. Each room has a kettle, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while selected rooms are fitted with a balcony and some have sea views. At the guest house the rooms include bed linen and towels. Leo's Baja Oasis offers a hot tub. The area is popular for cycling and hiking, and car hire is available at the accommodation. Laundry facilities, free private parking and a business centre are available, as well as a 24-hour front desk. Barco Hundido Beach is 2.5 km from Leo's Baja Oasis, while La Posada Beach is 3 km away. The nearest airport is Manuel Márquez de León International, 9 km from the guest house, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Club Hotel Cantamar by the Beach
address: Manzana F Lote 1 Puerto Comercial de Pichilingue, La Paz, Baja California Sur
description: Set close to Pichilingue beach, 10 miles north of La Paz, Club Hotel Cantamar by the Beach offers accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a bar. Featuring a garden, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The hotel features family rooms. At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Club Hotel Cantamar by the Beach offers a sun terrace. The nearest airport is Manuel Márquez de León International Airport, 23 km from the accommodation.

name: Real de Minas San Miguel de Allende
address: Ancha de San Antonio No. 1, Centro, 37700 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: Situated in the beautiful city of San Miguel Allende, this hotel features fitness centre and massage service. A spa and wellness centre is available. Hotel Real de Minas features many on-site recreational activities and facilities. Guests can enjoy billiards, tennis court and a spacious outdoor swimming pool. The hotel also features a special children's play area. The historic city of Virreinato is located only a short distance from the Hotel de Minas. Guests can discover beautiful architecture, stunning temples and churches as well as Baroque-style streets. The hotel is 850 metres from the San Miguel Arcángel Church and the History Museum. You can drive to León Airport in 1 hour and 40 minutes, and Querétaro Airport is 1.5 hours' drive away.

name: Mirador del Frayle
address: Callejón De Arias No. 4, 37700 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: Mirador del Frayle offers beautiful rooms around an outdoor pool and an attractive terrace. The property is located just over 10 minutes’ walk from central San Miguel de Allende. The spacious rooms are decorated in traditional colonial style. They have tiled floors and satellite TV, and many offer wonderful town views. The Frayle Mirador is set in beautiful gardens, and offers free Wi-Fi. There is free on-site parking. The hotel’s restaurant offers international food, and there are 2 bars, one by the pool.

name: Hotel Matilda
address: Aldama 53, Col. Centro, 37700 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: This luxurious property in central San Miguel de Allende has a swimming pool, terrace bar and spa. Its air-conditioned rooms and suites offer free Wi-Fi and flat-screen cable TV. The rooms and suites are decorated with modern Mexican photography. The large bathrooms have double sinks. The spa offers a range of massages and treatments, and includes a Turkish bath. It also includes a fitness centre. The Matilda’s restaurant offers a range of Mexican food by the well-known chef Vicente Torres. The bar offers cocktails which can also be enjoyed on the shady terrace. San Miguel de Allende is a UNESCO World Heritage Site located in the central highlands of Mexico. The property offers free on-site parking. Airport transfers can be arranged on request. The property offers bicycle hire.

name: Hotel Mesones 49
address: 49 Mesones Zona Centro, 37700 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: Situated in San Miguel de Allende and with Church of St. Michael the Archangel reachable within 300 metres, Hotel Mesones 49 features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi and a bar. The property is around 12 km from Sanctuary of Atotonilco, less than 1 km from Chorro´s trip and a 13-minute walk from Allende´s Institute. The accommodation provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and organising tours for guests. At the hotel, the rooms include a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Hotel Mesones 49 offers a continental or American breakfast. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Historic Museum of San Miguel de Allende, Public library and Las Monjas Temple. The nearest airport is Querétaro International, 72 km from Hotel Mesones 49, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Dos Casas Hotel & Spa
address: Quebrada 101, 37700 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: The 4-star Dos Casas Hotel & Spa offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in San Miguel De Allende. The property offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Daily housekeeping, airport transfer, restaurant, laundry service, bar are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Dos Casas Hotel & Spa combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in San Miguel De Allende unforgettable.Agoda

name: Hacienda El Santuario San Miguel de Allende
address: Aldama 41, Zona Centro, 37700 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: This hotel in San Miguel Allende offers luxurious guestrooms and exceptional staff, as well as the perfect location close to several historic sites and beautiful architecture. Each spacious guestroom at Hacienda El Santuario San Miguel de Allende features colonial Mexican style décor, a cozy sitting area, and several other amenities. After enjoying a complimentary continental breakfast, guests can relax in the internal patio and terrace. Guests at Hacienda El Santuario San Miguel de Allende can explore the fascinating area of San Miguel de Allende. The city is full of art and architecture, known for being one of the most beautiful architectural cities in Mexico, as well as several festivals and activities.

name: Amatte San Miguel de Allende
address: Salida Real a Queretaro 168, 37700 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: Situated in San Miguel de Allende, 1.5 km from Church of St. Michael the Archangel, Amatte San Miguel de Allende features accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Featuring a restaurant, the property also has a terrace and a bar. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Certain rooms are fitted with a kitchen with a fridge, an oven and a microwave. The rooms have bed linen. An American breakfast is available each morning at Amatte San Miguel de Allende. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Historic Museum of San Miguel de Allende, Chorro´s trip and Las Monjas Temple. The nearest airport is Querétaro International Airport, 70 km from Amatte San Miguel de Allende.

name: Hotel Mansión Virreyes By Rotamundos
address: 19 Canal Zona Centro, 37700 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
