description: Featuring 3-star accommodation, Hotel Mansión Virreyes by Rotamundos is set in San Miguel de Allende, 200 metres from Historic Museum of San Miguel de Allende and 200 metres from Church of St. Michael the Archangel. Boasting room service, this property also has a restaurant and a terrace. Guests can enjoy garden views. All guest rooms at the hotel come with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a shower. At Hotel Mansión Virreyes by Rotamundos all rooms have bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Las Monjas Temple, Public library and Allende´s Institute. The nearest airport is Querétaro International Airport, 72 km from Hotel Mansión Virreyes by Rotamundos.

name: Posada de las Monjas
address: 37 Canal, 37700 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: Located in San Miguel de Allende, 400 metres from Historic Museum of San Miguel de Allende, Posada de las Monjas provides accommodation with a shared lounge, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. Guests can make use of a bar. At the hotel, each room has a wardrobe. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at Posada de las Monjas also provide guests with free WiFi, while selected rooms include a city view. At the accommodation every room comes with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near Posada de las Monjas include Church of St. Michael the Archangel, Las Monjas Temple and Public library. The nearest airport is Querétaro International Airport, 73 km from the hotel.

name: Real de Corralejo
address: Carr. San Miguel De Allende - Qro. Km 7, 37700 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: Boasting a restaurant, a bar and a garden, Real de Corralejo is situated in San Miguel de Allende and is 9.2 km from Church of St. Michael the Archangel. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a children's playground. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk and room service for guests. Property is pet friendly. At the hotel the rooms have a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Guests at Real de Corralejo can enjoy a free continental breakfast. Popular points of interest near Real de Corralejo include Historic Museum of San Miguel de Allende, Allende´s Institute and Chorro´s trip. The nearest airport is Querétaro International Airport, 65 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Casamada
address: Potranca Col. Guadiana 16, 37770 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: Hotel Casamada has a garden, terrace, a restaurant and bar in San Miguel de Allende. This 5-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.3 km from Historic Museum of San Miguel de Allende. The rooms in the hotel are equipped with a coffee machine. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with free toiletries, all rooms at Hotel Casamada have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms are fitted with a patio. At the accommodation the rooms include bed linen and towels. Guests at Hotel Casamada can enjoy an American breakfast. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Church of St. Michael the Archangel, Allende´s Institute and Las Monjas Temple. The nearest airport is Querétaro International Airport, 72 km from Hotel Casamada.

name: Hotel Nena Centro
address: San Francisco 32 A, 37700 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: Located only 2 minutes’ drive from Juarez Park in central San Miguel de Allende, Nena Hotel Boutique has terraces with city views and an outdoor pool. Free Wi-Fi and free parking are available. The suites feature hand painted sinks and are decorated with local artwork. All suites offer air conditioning and heating, a safe and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. A coffee maker and coffee cups are also available. The on-site restaurant serves Mediterranean dishes and a continental breakfast. Other food options can be found within 500 metres, in central San Miguel. San Miguel Parish Church is less than 300 metres from Nena Hotel. Queretaro is 40 minutes’ drive away and Guanajuato can be reached in 1 hour by car.

name: Casa Grande Luxury Boutique Hotel
address: Cont. 5 de Mayo 8, Int 12B, 37760 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: Located in San Miguel de Allende, 1.4 km from Historic Museum of San Miguel de Allende, Casa Grande Luxury Boutique Hotel provides accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a bar. Each accommodation at the 5-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a barbecue and to a hot tub. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared kitchen and free WiFi throughout the property. All units at the hotel are equipped with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Every room is equipped with a coffee machine, while selected rooms have a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a stovetop. At Casa Grande Luxury Boutique Hotel all rooms come with bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Casa Grande Luxury Boutique Hotel include Church of St. Michael the Archangel, Allende´s Institute and Chorro´s trip. The nearest airport is Querétaro International Airport, 71 km from the hotel.

name: Albor San Miguel de Allende, Tapestry Collection by Hilton
address: Saltito de Guadalupe sn, 37780 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: San Miguel de Allende is recognized as one of the most important cities during the time of New Spain. Nowadays, it is one of the most idyllic destinations in Mexico and visitors from all over the world come to learn about the history and culture of the city. Explore this destination from Albor San Miguel de Allende, Tapestry Collection by Hilton. Admire the colonial architecture and the history that lives in every corner. The hotel is a tribute to contemporary Mexican architecture and was built with materials from the region it offers a spacious lobby with abundant natural light and terraces that are integrated into the space. The hotel rooms offer views of the city and valley of San Miguel de Allende the spacious suites feature terraces and a living room. The Albor restaurant offers breakfast, lunch, and dinner of international cuisine with a gastronomic touch from this part of the country. A complete gym and a swimming pool complement the amenities and services. Planning an event is easy with over 1,000 square meters of space in an esplanade inspired by contemporary Mexican design and with unique views of the city. Choose from a variety of packages and let our professionals help you create a truly memorable moment for groups or social events of any size. We have a multipurpose room for 70 people in an auditorium, perfect for business meetings, conferences, and special occasions, as well as a private room for 10 people in our Albor restaurant. Our Albor Terrace provides covered outdoor space overlooking the city of San Miguel de Allende and surrounded by terraces with endemic vegetation of the region, which are organically integrated into the pool area and botanical labyrinth. Ideal for special events and meetings Enlist the help of the hotel team to assist you with room selection, configurations, and technology requirements, as well as customized catering services to create a unique and memorable event from start to finish.Hilton

name: Hotel Splash Inn
address: Carretera Federal San Miguel de Allende - Dr. Mora Km. 6, 37700 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: Set in San Miguel de Allende, 7.6 km from Church of St. Michael the Archangel, Hotel Splash Inn offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a terrace. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is located 7.9 km from Historic Museum of San Miguel de Allende. At the hotel all rooms come with air conditioning, a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a patio with a garden view. The units feature a wardrobe. Guests at Hotel Splash Inn can enjoy a continental breakfast. Sanctuary of Atotonilco is 20 km from the accommodation, while Chorro´s trip is 7.2 km away. The nearest airport is Querétaro International Airport, 72 km from Hotel Splash Inn.

name: Hotel Atotonilco El Viejo
address: Carretera Santuario Atotonilco, 37760 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: Offering an outdoor swimming pool and a spa and wellness centre, Atotonilco Hotel & Club is located 1 km from Atotonilco Sanctuary and 13 km from San Miguel de Allende. The rooms offer rustic décor, wooden furniture and a TV. There is a terrace and satellite channels. Private bathrooms also come with a shower. At Atotonilco Hotel & Club you will find a restaurant serving international dishes. Other facilities offered include a tour desk and free parking. The hotel is 12.3 km from Public library and 12.4 km from Las Monjas Temple. Queretaro International Airport is 100 km away.

name: Live Aqua San Miguel De Allende Urban Resort
address: Calzada de la Presa No. 85, Zona Centro, 37700 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: Live Aqua is the luxury lifestyle brand with an exclusive concept that entices you to enjoy the pleasure of the senses in sophisticated and alluring atmospheres of dreamlike destinations. Live Aqua was created by pleasure-seekers who find inspiration in art, design and subtle details that fit their unique lifestyle. At Live Aqua, every day is an experience of endless sensations where you have the freedom to be yourself. Every space tempts and stimulates your senses with aromas, textures, flavors and sounds. Here, your desires are taken into consideration to assure your experience is pleasurable. Feel the feeling of Live Aqua.Please be advised that from March 14 2019, a 10% service charge resort fee will be charge per room per night.To our guests, we inform you that: outside visitors, such as makeup artists, stylists, photographers, etc; are not allowed into any of the exclusive guest areas, including the rooms. Available adult extra with additional cost.Please be advised that the following hotel services are with extra charge: parking and transportation. We appreciate your understanding. Please be advised that our that our wood esplanade will be under renovation from February 7th to March 14th. The noise will be less because it is far from the rooms, no service will be limited or affected. We appreciate your understanding.iHotelier/iStay

name: Rancho Labradores
address: 65.5 km Carretera San Miguel a Dolores, 37380 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: Set in the countryside near San Miguel de Allende, this rural property features a hot spring-fed pool and a small free fitness centre. Rancho Labradores provides free Wi-Fi in public areas. The rustic suites, studios and villas feature Mexican-style décor and lots of natural light. They come with a comfortable seating area, satellite or cable TV and a simple kitchenette. Towels, sheets and basic toiletries are provided. This property’s on-site café serves breakfast and lunch, and guests will find other dining options within 5 km. There is a supermarket 10 km away. San Miguel de Allende’s historic centre is only 15 km from the property and features excellent sightseeing, shopping and community events for expats. Ventanas de San Miguel Golf Course is only a 10-minute drive from Rancho Labradores. Atotonilco, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, is only 2 km from the property, while Guanajuato International Airport is a 1.5-hour drive away.

name: View Hotel Boutique
address: Privada Norte 64 Ejido de San Juan Xido ( Cabras), 37700 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: Offering an outdoor swimming pool and a hot tub, View Hotel Boutique is located 9 km from San Miguel de Allende Historic Centre. Free Wi-Fi access is available in all areas. The rooms and suites offer a flat-screen TV, cable channels and a terrace. Featuring a hairdryer, the private bathrooms also come with free toiletries and towels. You can enjoy a lake view and a mountain view from all the rooms. At View Hotel Boutique you will find a 24-hour front desk, free parking and a garden. Other facilities offered include a tour desk, luggage storage and an ironing service. The property offers an a la cárte menu. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including cycling and hiking. This property is 8.8 km from Juárez Park and 10 km from San Miguel de Allende Historic Museum. Querétaro International Airport is 95 km away.

name: Sheraton Buganvilias Resort and Convention Center
address: Blvd. Francisco Medina Ascencio No. 999, 48333 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Effortless and elevated, our newly renovated Sheraton Buganvilias Resort & Convention Center is a smart way to stay in stunning Jalisco, Mexico. Thrive in our beachfront location close to the city and less than a quarter mile from downtown shops and restaurants at Malecon Boardwalk and 4.1 miles from Gustavo Diaz Ordaz International Airport. Relax in a Puerto Vallarta hotel room or suite with luxury bedding, marble bathrooms, flat-screen TVs, room service and oceanfront views. Recharge with our wide variety of renovated restaurants and keep moving with our four tennis courts, two outdoor pools, swim-up bar and 24-hour Sheraton Fitness center. When it's time to pamper, book our blissful Maiavé Village spa. Families with children appreciate Sheratoons, providing the little ones with fun and engaging activities. For business travelers, we offer streamlined event spaces and Puerto Vallarta packages for groups. Experience Jalisco, Mexico, the right way at Sheraton Buganvilias Resort & Convention Center.Marriott

name: Fiesta Americana Puerto Vallarta & Spa Hotel
address: Av. Francisco Medina Ascencio km 2.5, 48333 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Location This hotel lies on the Bahía de Banderas bay and is around 200 m from the nearest beach and the town centre with its access to the public transport network. The airport is only some 5 minutes away. Facilities The hotel features 291 accommodation units. A lift can be used to access the upper floors. Amenities include a cloakroom, a safe, currency exchange facilities and a cash machine. Internet access (for a fee) and wireless internet access (for a fee) are available in the public areas. In addition, guests can also enjoy a balcony. The hotel features a range of facilities for guests with disabilities. Gastronomic options offered by the hotel include a restaurant, a dining area and a bar. Shopping facilities are available. The grounds of the hotel feature a playground and an attractive garden. Parking facilities available to guests include a garage and a car park. Among the additional services available are a childcare service, medical assistance, room service and a laundry. Rooms All rooms feature air conditioning and a bathroom. Most accommodation units additionally feature a balcony or a terrace. Each accommodation unit features a double bed or a king-size bed. Extra beds can be requested. A safe and a minibar also feature. The rooms offer a range of amenities, including tea and coffee making equipment. An ironing set is also available to guests. Convenient features include internet access, a telephone, a TV, a radio and an alarm clock. In each of the bathrooms, guests will find a shower, a bathtub and a hairdryer. Sports/Entertainment The hotel offers an outdoor pool and a children's pool. Sun loungers and parasols offer the ideal way to unwind. A hot tub provides an opportunity for relaxation. The hotel offers an extensive outdoor sport and leisure programme, with tennis, volleyball, golf and horse riding. Those who enjoy watersports can have fun with diving and aquafit. Guests of the hotel can enjoy indoor activities including a gym. A wellness area with a spa can be used by guests of the hotel. For a fee, massage treatments are also available. An entertainment programme, an entertainment programme for children, a disco and a kids' club provide guests with recreational options during their free time. Meals The hotel offers a wide range of bookable meals and board options, including breakfast, lunch, dinner and full board. Payment All major credit cards, including American Express, VISA and MasterCard, are accepted for payment.WebBeds

name: Rivera del Rio Boutique Hotel
address: 104 Rivera del Rio, 48380 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Situated a 15-minute walk from the beach, Rivera Del Rio offers an outdoor pool, hot tub and charming individually decorated rooms and suites. description: Oaxaca is one of the most visited places in Mexico thanks to its cultural and architectural treasures. The city, founded in 1529 will captivate you with its colonial buildings and green quarry precincts. Here you will find City Centro by Marriott Oaxaca. We offer you a new experience that stimulates the senses, reinventing the way of staying in a hotel. Famous for its religious architecture, Oaxaca is full of churches and convents that enclose the colonial history of Mexico and has more than a thousand historical monuments that reflect the evolution of the city. The most important are the Metropolitan Cathedral and the ex-Convent of Santo Domingo, that it contains inside the Museum of Cultures, the Fray Francisco de Burgoa Library and the Ethnobotanical Garden. If you like pre-Hispanic art and culture, we recommend an excursion to one of its archaeological spots, such as Monte Alban or Ocotlan or visit Hierve El Agua, a natural place whose attractions are fossilized waterfalls.Marriott

Our rooms are ideal for business travelers equipped with desk, safe, hair dryer, coffee maker, plasma TV. During your stay you can enjoy our services such as a gym, business center, room service, parking and complimentary WI FI. With multiple attractions just a few minutes away, such as bars, restaurants, museums or churches. You can go shopping at the most exclusive malls or visit the industrial parks, our main convention center Poliforum Leon is located just ten minutes away. Six meeting rooms for your events with capacity for up to 180 people. In addition to two family restaurants with a terrace that allows you to appreciate the unique view of the city.Wyndham

description: Located in the newly developed business and hotel area, just 5 minutes from the Galeras Boulevard business park and with easy access to the area's tourist attractions, such as the San Marcos Cathedral, the Miguel lvarez Zoo and 45 minutes from the Sumidero Canyon and Chiapa de Corzo. name: Lavid Aguascalientes
address: Boulevard Jose Maria Chavez 1305, 20290 Aguascalientes, Aguascalientes
description: LaVid Aguascalientes is located in Aguascalientes, 4.6 km from Victoria Stadium. With a terrace, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. There is free private parking and the property provides paid airport shuttle service. At the hotel, each room is equipped with a balcony. Guest rooms in LaVid Aguascalientes are equipped with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries. An American breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. With staff speaking English, Spanish and French, around the clock guidance is available at the reception. The nearest airport is Jesús Terán Peredo International Airport, 20 km from LaVid Aguascalientes.

name: Fairfield Inn & Suites by Marriott Aguascalientes
address: 101 Avenida Paseo San Gerardo, 20348 Aguascalientes, Aguascalientes
description: Turn any corporate trip into a Mexican getaway at Fairfield Inn & Suites Aguascalientes. With a convenient location in the district of San Marcos, we are just moments away from prominent destinations such as downtown, Teatro Aguascalientes and the Nissan industrial plant. When you need a moment to yourself, withdraw into the contemporary comfort of our spacious rooms and suites featuring complimentary Wi-Fi, flat-panel TVs and a grocery shopping service allowing you to be at your absolute best. Jump-start your morning at our free breakfast buffet serving an assortment of hearty and healthy American classics. Following an eventful day, unwind with a handcrafted cocktail from our lobby bar. Business travelers will love our intimate meeting room showcasing tasteful designs and modern equipment. At Fairfield Inn & Suites Aguascalientes, you’re our #1 priority. Ask us about The Fairfield 100% Guarantee™, where we promise you'll be satisfied or we'll make it right. That's our commitment to you.Marriott

name: Lotel-Casa Arca
address: Relox # 22 Col. Centro, 37700 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: Located in San Miguel de Allende, 400 metres from Church of St. Michael the Archangel, LOtel-Casa Arca provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a shared lounge and a restaurant. This 5-star hotel offers a bar. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At LOtel-Casa Arca each room comes with bed linen and towels. An American breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. LOtel-Casa Arca offers a sun terrace. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Historic Museum of San Miguel de Allende, Public library and Las Monjas Temple. The nearest airport is Querétaro International Airport, 72 km from LOtel-Casa Arca.
